translation.en: ♪ You're so well-spoken ♪
♪ You show them you're outside… ♪
I know what you're thinkin'. How did a guy like me land a girl like her?
translation.zh:
‎我知道你在想什么
‎像我这样一个家伙怎么跟她好上了？

translation.en: -We get this all the time. -We've been friends forever.
translation.zh:
‎-一直有人这么问我们
‎-我们做了一辈子朋友了

translation.en: [Dunk] I've always had a crush on her.
But society has deemed it socially unacceptable -for a tall girl to date a short guy. -[sighs]
translation.zh:
‎但是社会上有种风气觉得
‎小个男孩不配去约会高个女孩

translation.en: Tell me about it. I mean, I was constantly bullied for being tall.
translation.zh:
‎可不是嘛
‎我以前也总是因为个子高被人欺负

translation.en: -How's the weather up there? -Especially by my tormentor, Kimmy.
translation.zh:
‎-上面的天气怎么样吧？
‎-欺负我最厉害的就是基米

translation.en: -Nice sweatpants, Sasquatch. -[all giggling]
[Jodi] It felt like a curse.
Then this Swedish exchange student named Stig showed up--
translation.zh:
‎后来出现了一个名叫斯蒂格的
‎瑞典交换生…

translation.en: -[Dunk] And stayed with my family. -[Jodi] He was even taller than me.
They dated for a bit, but he totally played her.
translation.zh: ‎他们约会了 但是他最终耍了她

translation.en: [Jodi] Yeah, he did, and he humiliated me in front of our entire class.
translation.zh: ‎是的 他在整个年级面前羞辱了我

translation.en: She's, uh, secretly in love with me.
What?
Don't worry, I stepped in. I stood up for her…
translation.zh: ‎别担心 然后我挺身而出…

translation.en: She is so much cooler than all you guys combined.
translation.zh:
‎她比你们所有这些家伙加起来
‎还要酷得多

translation.en: Took a punch to the face. It was no big deal.
translation.zh: ‎我脸上挨了一拳 这不算什么

translation.en: -[chuckles] It was a big deal. -It was a big deal.
translation.zh:
‎-真的很值得一说
‎-真的很值得一说

translation.en: Yeah, I mean…
He was the one who gave me the confidence to stand up for myself
translation.zh:
‎他是那个给我自信
‎让我敢于为自己说话的人

translation.en: with the sweetest gift. [chuckles]
After that, I owned my height.
translation.zh: ‎那之后 我为自己的身高而骄傲

translation.en: And homecoming was a big step for me.
translation.zh: ‎返校节上 我做了一件大事

translation.en: Uh, hi. I-- I'm Jodi.
You may know me as "Amazon" or "Jodi the Green Giant."
translation.zh:
‎你听说的我可能是“亚马逊女战士”
‎或者“绿巨人乔蒂”

translation.en: Being tall actually is what makes me me, and I-- I like me.
translation.zh: ‎长得高真的成就了现在的我 ‎我喜欢自己

translation.en: [Jodi] My best friend Fareeda
and my sister Harper were there, cheering me on.
translation.zh:
‎我的姐姐哈珀都在现场
‎为我加油打劲

translation.en: And that's when she realized…
That he was the one I was supposed to be with all along.
translation.zh:
‎一直以来
‎他才是那个应该和我厮守的人

translation.en: Mm-hm, which makes sense,
considering I carried around a milk crate for my entire life,
translation.zh:
‎这样就能说得通为什么 ‎我一直都带着个牛奶箱
‎等待机会可以吻她

translation.en: waiting for my chance to kiss her.
translation.zh:
‎我一直都带着个牛奶箱
‎等待机会可以吻她

translation.en: [Jodi] Which finally happened about three months ago.
translation.zh: ‎那一刻终于在三个月前发生了

translation.en: [Dunk] And it's been bliss ever since.
Would the lady care--
[yells] My back!
Unfortunately, the milk crate's no longer with us.
Which is why I am buying him a backpack for our three-month anniversary.
translation.zh:
‎因此我想在三个月纪念日时
‎给他买个背包

translation.en: Are you sure you don't mind leaning down to kiss me?
translation.zh: ‎你确定你不介意俯身吻我吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I'm sure.
-Sorry, we were just babbling. -Yeah, what was the question again?
translation.zh:
‎-对不起 瞧我们这一通胡说八道
‎-对 你的问题是什么来着？

translation.en: What brings you in today?
-Well, the backpack. -Yeah, this one.
You like this one, right?
-Yeah. -Okay.
-Hey. -I got you a smoothie.
-Oh, thank you. -Of course.
-Jodi! -Mikey! -What's up? -[Mikey] What up, girl?
translation.zh:
‎-乔蒂！怎么样 妹子？
‎-迈奇！你怎么样？

translation.en: -Hey-- -[Jodi] Oh, here.
I got you. There you go.
translation.zh:
‎-我来帮你 这样就行
‎-谢谢

translation.en: Suzie!
I need to know where you got that top now.
translation.zh:
‎我现在就要知道
‎你的上衣是在哪里买的

translation.en: Fareeda Marks. Remember the name.
translation.zh: ‎法丽达·马克斯 记住这个牌子

translation.en: -Thought she was talking about mine. -It's cute.
Can I buy you a cup of coffee some time?
translation.zh: ‎什么时候能请你喝杯咖啡吗？

translation.en: Hey. Boyfriend. Right here.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 她的男朋友就在这里

translation.en: Didn't know. Just moved here.
Keep moving.
But I've never given a speech in class before.
Just go out there and do your best, and if you mess up, just know it's okay.
translation.zh:
‎只管走上去 尽力而为
‎搞砸了也没关系的

translation.en: Jodi! It's up!
Big moment.
Guys.
I know you said not to make a big deal out of this…
-[both] But we didn't listen! -It's just an audition.
translation.zh: ‎但我们没听进去！ ‎这只不过是次试演

translation.en: That you've been wanting to do since middle school.
translation.zh: ‎你从中学以来就一直在等待了

translation.en: This is a moment to commemorate.
[Stig] Hey!
This is not.
-[Jodi] Hey. -Wow. What are we celebrating?
We aren't celebrating anything, because we are no longer friends.
translation.zh:
‎我们没庆祝什么
‎因为你已经不是我们的朋友

translation.en: -Keep walking, IKEA. -Oh!
We're, uh-- We're celebrating my name on that audition list.
translation.zh: ‎我们在庆祝我去登记了试演名单

translation.en: Bye Bye Birdie? Wow.
That's my second favorite musical! After Guys and Dolls.
translation.zh:
‎那是我第二喜欢的音乐剧！
‎仅次于《红男绿女》

translation.en: Dunk, wanna know my third favorite?
translation.zh: ‎想知道我第三喜欢的是什么吗？

translation.en: [laughs] Oh my God! I don't care.
Okay.
[Stig] Okay.
See you guys later.
Knuckle touch?
Handshake?
[Dunk] See you at home.
I can't believe he's trying to be friends with us
translation.zh:
‎真不敢相信他在羞辱了你之后
‎还想和我们做朋友

translation.en: after torturing you with his sick, twisted mind games.
translation.zh:
‎真不敢相信他在羞辱了你之后
‎还想和我们做朋友 ‎还拿出那套恶心扭曲的套路

translation.en: I cannot believe that you forgave him after everything.
translation.zh:
‎我不敢相信发生了这一切后
‎你还原谅了他

translation.en: He's apologized to us multiple times. Can you just give him a break?
translation.zh:
‎他已经向我们道歉很多次了
‎你们能放过他吗？

translation.en: -No. -No. He's the worst.
-To Jodi. -[chuckles] To Jodi.
-To me. -[Fareeda chuckles]
-Mmm. Apple cider, a classic. [gargling]
Hi.
Hello. [chuckles]
I'm Tommy.
I know. [chuckles]
I saw you in Hairspray last year.
translation.zh: ‎我去年在《发胶星梦》里看过你

translation.en: -You were amazing. -[laughs]
-Thank you. [laughs] -It was really good.
I'm Jodi, by the way.
[Tommy] I know.
I'm a fan of your work too.
-My work? -Yeah.
"So go ahead and… and keep calling me names."
translation.zh: ‎“那就继续用那些名字称呼我吧”

translation.en: "Keep making fun of me. Keep asking me,
'How's the weather up there?' Because the weather up here is great."
translation.zh:
‎‘上面的天气怎么样？’
‎因为这里的天气真的不错”

translation.en: -Mm-hm. Yeah. -It's from your homecoming speech.
You remember it.
I do. Yeah, every word.
How? [laughs]
Let's just say you are extremely memorable.
-[boy] Hey, man. Watch it. -[Stig] Oh, sorry. Sorry.
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 朋友 看路
‎-对不起

translation.en: -Phew. -Jeez.
-[sighs] -You okay?
Yeah. Just a little on edge.
I've heard you sing. You have nothing to be nervous about.
translation.zh: ‎我听过你唱歌 你不必担心

translation.en: You'll do great.
Thanks.
What are you doing here?
Auditioning. Same as you.
Madeline has already cast me in lead roles multiple times,
translation.zh: ‎玛德琳已经让我演过好几次主角了

translation.en: so this is really more of a formality than an audition.
translation.zh: ‎所以这次试演只是走个形式

translation.en: -Jodi Kreyman. -Yeah.
-[Madeline] You're up. -Okay.
-You're gonna do great. -Thanks.
[Kimmy] Try to relax…
'cause you don't stand a chance.
Miss me, Stiggy baby?
[sighs] Kimmy.
♪ One boy ♪
♪ That's the way ♪
♪ It should ♪
♪ Be ♪
So you've never performed on stage before?
translation.zh: ‎你从来没在舞台上表演过吗？

translation.en: Never.
What about that speech you gave at the homecoming dance?
translation.zh: ‎那你在返校节上的那次演讲呢？

translation.en: Oh, uh… Well, I wouldn't call that a performance. [laughs]
But you were on stage, in front of a huge crowd,
translation.zh:
‎但你当时登上了舞台
‎还面对着一大群人

translation.en: delivering what was essentially an improvised monologue. Isn't that performing?
translation.zh:
‎呈现了一场即兴的独角戏
‎那不是表演吗？

translation.en: I guess it is. [chuckles]
What would you say to people who don't think that being tall is a real problem?
translation.zh: ‎你想对那些认为 ‎身高不是现实问题的人说什么？

translation.en: Excuse me?
Getting a terminal illness, being homeless,
not knowing where your next meal is coming from…
Those are real problems.
But you seem to have so much going for you.
translation.zh:
‎但是你似乎觉得
‎自己的问题特别大

translation.en: What do you have to complain about?
Well, I'm not saying being tall is worse than those things.
translation.zh:
‎我没有说长得高
‎比这些事情更糟糕

translation.en: It's just sometimes it feels like it is, but I know that it's not.
translation.zh:
‎有时候感觉是如此
‎但我知道并不是如此

translation.en: It just… doesn't make all the bad things
translation.zh:
‎但这样并不会
‎让我生活中的所有糟糕事情

translation.en: that have happened to me every day of my entire life any less real.
translation.zh:
‎但这样并不会
‎让我生活中的所有糟糕事情 ‎变得不真实

translation.en: Performing has always been my dream,
but I didn't think I could do it, until now.
translation.zh:
‎但是我以前不知道自己能不能行
‎直到现在

translation.en: Okay.
Thank you for coming in.
-[soft piano music] -[man] Wait a second, Harper.
-You were offered a job? -[Harper] Mm-hm.
Like a real job?
Like with money?
-Yes. With benefits and a parking space… -Whoo!
translation.zh: ‎对 有福利 有停车位

translation.en: No, I think you mean a 401(k).
translation.zh:
‎不 我觉得你说的是
‎401(k)退休金计划

translation.en: -Mmm… Agree to disagree. -That's usually--
Wait. What is this job?
Say hello to the co-host
translation.zh: ‎敬请期待 ‎我即将合作主持的

translation.en: of the newest behind-the-scenes entertainment show
on the Pageant Network.
There's a Pageant Network? What channel?
How dare you? Come on.
Congrats.
Thank you. Oh, by the way, the job is in LA.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 对了 这份工作在洛城

translation.en: Louisiana?
-You're moving to California? -Los Angeles?
Sorry, just wanted to rip the Band-Aid off.
translation.zh: ‎对不起 我只想快刀斩乱麻

translation.en: Every time she speaks, it's like I'm getting punched in the face.
translation.zh:
‎每次她这么说
‎我都觉得脸上被揍了一下

translation.en: -Let's have another baby. -I'm very fertile.
translation.zh: ‎我们再生一个吧 ‎我还很能生

translation.en: Okay, this is my chance to prove to myself
translation.zh:
‎好吧 这次机会能够
‎向我自己和所有人证明

translation.en: and everyone else that I have more to offer this world than just--
Yeah.
That I'm more than just shiny hair -and perfectly exfoliated skin. -[phone alert]
translation.zh:
‎不只是拥有闪亮的秀发
‎和完美无暇的肌肤

translation.en: -I'm someone to be taken seriously. -Yes, you are.
translation.zh: ‎我也是个能认真做事的人 ‎对 你是

translation.en: -[Harper] Which is why-- -[screams] Oh my God, I got the lead! Oh!
translation.zh: ‎所以我才要… ‎我的天 我选上主角了

translation.en: What?
-Sorry. I did not mean to cut you off. -Uh, no, no, I was done. What lead?
translation.zh: ‎对不起 我不是故意打断你 ‎没有 我说完了 什么主角？

translation.en: The spring musical.
The director just texted me, and I'm playing Kim in Bye Bye Birdie.
translation.zh: ‎导演刚刚给我发信息 ‎我要演《欢乐今宵》的基姆

translation.en: -What? -What?
Look at my girls! Both headed for greatness.
translation.zh: ‎看看我的女儿们啊 ‎全都有大好未来

translation.en: I gotta-- I gotta text Dunk.
-Oh yeah. -[laughing]
Dad, you-- you text my boyfriend?
translation.zh: ‎爸爸 你在跟我男朋友发信息？

translation.en: -[mom] Oh yeah. -Well, seven, eight times a day, max.
-That's weird. -Strange.
Oh! We're gonna throw you a huge party for opening night.
translation.zh:
‎开演的那晚
‎我们要给你办一场大派对

translation.en: No, please. No party.
-Yes. You are getting a party! -Yes.
-[parents] Party! Party! Party! -No. No…
-[Jodi] No. -[mom] How do you feel about floats?
translation.zh: ‎哇哦 ‎你觉得搞点漂浮物怎么样？

translation.en: -[Jodi] No. -[mom] Theme - birds.
-You said 12, right? -Thank you.
-And, uh… -[seller] Thanks.
And whatever this fine couple wants. It's on me.
translation.zh:
‎不管这对美好的情侣想要什么
‎都算我的

translation.en: Toppings are included.
-[woman] That's so sweet. -No problem. We're having a big night.
translation.zh:
‎-你太好了
‎-没关系 ‎我们正在度过美好的夜晚
‎我们在庆祝

translation.en: -We're celebrating, so… [chuckles] -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎我们正在度过美好的夜晚
‎我们在庆祝

translation.en: -So, treating yourself to two scoops? -You know my motto.
translation.zh: ‎所以你自己要两勺冰淇淋？ ‎你知道我的格言 越高总是越好

translation.en: -Taller is always better. -Ah.
translation.zh: ‎你知道我的格言 越高总是越好

translation.en: Speaking of taller, what's she, like, six-two, six-three?
translation.zh:
‎说到越高 她多高来着
‎一米八八 还是一米九二？

translation.en: -Rude. -No.
No, no, no, rude. You know what? Excuse me.
translation.zh:
‎不 没礼貌 ‎-对不起 先生 不含配料了
‎-不 没事 谢谢你

translation.en: -Hold on. No more toppings for you. -No, no, no, it's cool. Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-对不起 先生 不含配料了
‎-不 没事 谢谢你

translation.en: Enjoy your toppings, guys. Okay.
[Jodi] It's okay.
-Really? -Yeah.
Three months ago, that really would have bothered you.
translation.zh: ‎三个月前 这还让你很困扰

translation.en: Probably.
And, uh, also three months ago,
you could barely speak in front of a crowd.
But now you're going to be performing in front of the whole school.
translation.zh: ‎现在你即将在全校面前表演了

translation.en: [sighs] Yeah.
I mean, as the star of the show.
A night that will change your whole life.
translation.zh: ‎一个晚上将会改变你的一生

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah…
But thank you for believing I could do it, even when I didn't.
translation.zh: ‎但是谢谢你相信我可以 ‎哪怕我不行

translation.en: You're gonna crush it.
Thanks.
Cheers.
Cheers.
[voice] You don't deserve this part.
You got lucky.
-[crickets chirping] -[voice] You finally got your dream.
You think you can actually pull this off?
So this voice just pops into your head last night while brushing your teeth,
translation.zh:
‎所以 昨晚刷牙的时候
‎这个声音一直在你脑海里出现

translation.en: and now it won't go away?
Yeah.
Have you heard it before?
Well, I mean, there's always been a voice, but nothing like this.
translation.zh: ‎一直有种声音 但是不像这样

translation.en: I mean, this one, it's just--
Louder? Crueler? Makes you believe your worst fears and insecurities are true?
translation.zh: ‎更大声？更残忍？ ‎让你觉得你最坏的担心都会成真？

translation.en: Yes!
What?
I was… afraid this might happen.
I prayed it wouldn't, but if only I'd prayed harder.
translation.zh:
‎我曾祈祷不会
‎但是我要是祈祷得再虔诚些就好了

translation.en: What are you talking about?
That voice!
That negative voice in your head,
the one that tells you that you're a fraud,
and all the wonderful things happening in your life
aren't because you're talented or smart.
translation.zh: ‎你人生中所有的美好事情 ‎都不是因为你有天赋或者聪明

translation.en: It's just because you're lucky.
But why would it happen now?
[laughs] Because now you're out there,
risking failure and humiliation,
and the more out there you are,
the louder that voice gets.
So how do I make it stop?
You can't.
It's just a horrible part of life that never goes away.
translation.zh:
‎那就是生活的一部分
‎永远不会消失

translation.en: Like Maroon 5.
-[sniffs] Ugh, allergies. -Wait, so you get it too?
translation.zh:
‎-过敏了
‎-等等 所以你也有过？

translation.en: [laughs] No! No! No. No, no, no, no, no.
But I've been in 37 beauty pageants.
And every single time, I'd see that voice tear someone apart so badly,
translation.zh:
‎每次我都能看到有些人
‎被那种声音伤得特别严重

translation.en: they couldn't even step foot on stage.
So you're saying that that… that could be me?
I'm saying there's no worse bully than the one you create in your own head.
translation.zh:
‎我是在说没有什么
‎比你脑海里的想法更能伤害你

translation.en: You have to control it. Otherwise, it could eventually get worse
translation.zh:
‎你得控制它
‎否则会变得更糟糕

translation.en: and control you.
Okay. [sighs]
You cast Jodi as the lead and me as her understudy?
translation.zh:
‎你选了乔蒂做主演
‎让我做她的替补？

translation.en: Theater is about taking risks.
I cast Jodi as the lead because she possesses
translation.zh: ‎我选乔蒂当主演 因为她有一种

translation.en: a rawness and authenticity that the role desperately needs.
translation.zh: ‎那个角色需要的原始和真实

translation.en: So I'm just supposed to sit back in rehearsals and watch?
translation.zh: ‎所以我在彩排的时候就坐着看吗？

translation.en: There are no small parts, Kimmy, just small actors.
translation.zh: ‎没有小角色 基米 只有小演员

translation.en: Well, that's nice to know.
[yells] 'Cause one thing Jodi definitely is not is a small actor!
translation.zh: ‎因为乔蒂可不是什么小演员！

translation.en: I'm sorry, Kimmy.
[scoffs] Oh, this isn't over. I'm just getting started.
translation.zh: ‎不 这还没完 我要开始搞事了

translation.en: Oh, I'm afraid to ask.
All we have to do is humiliate Jodi so badly
translation.zh: ‎我们要做的是在排练第一天

translation.en: on the first day of rehearsal that she drops out.
translation.zh: ‎好好羞辱乔蒂一番 让她退出

translation.en: For instance, I'm just pitching, you slip NyQuil
translation.zh:
‎比如说 我只是提供个想法
‎你可以把安眠药倒进

translation.en: into one of the smoothies Dunkleman makes her so she passes out.
translation.zh:
‎比如说 我只是提供个想法
‎你可以把安眠药倒进 ‎邓柯曼给她准备的奶昔里
‎这样她就昏过去了

translation.en: -Or did you see that movie Carrie? -Mm-hm.
She gets a bucket of pig guts dropped on her from the rafters.
"Bye Bye Jodi."
I don't know where I would get pig guts.
-[chuckles] -Then Google it.
-What? -Doing your dirty work…
translation.zh: ‎那就上网查啊 怎么了？ ‎做这些脏事让我觉得有些…脏

translation.en: It's just starting to make me feel a little, well… well, dirty.
translation.zh: ‎做这些脏事让我觉得有些…脏

translation.en: -Where is this coming from? -Ever since we lost Liz, I just…
translation.zh: ‎为什么会这么觉得？ ‎自从我们失去莉兹

translation.en: I-- I can't stop thinking about how fragile life is.
translation.zh: ‎我就忍不住想生命是多么脆弱

translation.en: She didn't die! Her mom got a new job, and they moved to Seattle.
translation.zh:
‎她没有死 她妈妈找到了新工作
‎她们搬去了西雅图！

translation.en: Okay, but still, it's like one day, your best friend is right here,
translation.zh:
‎好吧 但还是一样
‎某天 你最好的朋友在这里

translation.en: and then the next, they're gone.
translation.zh: ‎然后过了一天 她们不见了

translation.en: I don't know what to tell you, Schnip. This is who I am.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道要怎么跟你说
‎这就是我

translation.en: And if you can't have my back when I need you the most, then…
translation.zh:
‎如果你不能
‎在我最需要的时候支持我 那么

translation.en: maybe this friendship has run its course.
translation.zh: ‎也许这段友情就走到尽头了

translation.en: Maybe it has.
Wait, what?
Maybe I need to find out who I am on my own,
translation.zh: ‎也许我得自己去发现我是谁

translation.en: instead of as your sidekick. That's all I've ever been.
translation.zh:
‎而不是作为你的伙伴
‎一直以来都是如此

translation.en: Be well. Try and remember the good times.
translation.zh: ‎好好的 试着回忆一下好时光

translation.en: You try and remember the good times! [scoffs]
translation.zh: ‎你才要试着回忆一下好时光呢！

translation.en: -[Dunk] What do you think of this color? -[Jodi] So beautiful. I'm snapping it all.
translation.zh:
‎-你觉得这是什么颜色？
‎-好漂亮 我要它们都拍下来

translation.en: -[Dunk] I don't know if I'm feeling 'em. -[Jodi] No?
translation.zh:
‎-我不知道它们怎么样
‎-不吗？我觉得你戴着很好看

translation.en: -I really think they look great on you. -Hey, Fareeda.
translation.zh:
‎-我不知道它们怎么样
‎-不吗？我觉得你戴着很好看 ‎嘿 法丽达

translation.en: Is this me?
I don't know, Stig. Who are you?
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 斯蒂格 ‎你是谁？

translation.en: I-- I'm sorry, I just can't believe that you invited Stig out today with us.
translation.zh:
‎对不起 我就是不敢相信
‎你今天邀请了斯蒂格和我们一起

translation.en: He didn't get a part in the show.
He's been really down, and, I don't know, he has no one to hang out with, so…
translation.zh: ‎他真的很难过 没人和他玩 所以…

translation.en: Sounds like a him problem, not a me problem.
translation.zh: ‎听起来那是他的问题 不是我的问题

translation.en: Okay, if I am able to give him a second chance,
translation.zh: ‎如果我都能给他第二次机会

translation.en: you should be able to give him a first one.
translation.zh: ‎也许你应该先给他一次机会

translation.en: Let's be honest, you never really did.
translation.zh: ‎说实话 你都没给过他机会

translation.en: -[Dunk] Right after I make this call. -That shirt is sick.
translation.zh:
‎-等我打完这个电话
‎-这件衣服好酷

translation.en: Oh, thank you. [chuckles]
Where'd you get it?
Actually, my best friend Fareeda designed it.
translation.zh: ‎其实这是我最好的朋友法丽达设计的

translation.en: -Hi. -Yeah, and she's amazing. [chuckles]
She knows the three Fs like nobody's business.
You know the three Fs?
Form, fit, function. Come on.
I replaced having a social life with watching Queer Eye. Okay?
translation.zh:
‎我的社交生活已经变成
‎看《粉雄救兵》了 好吗？

translation.en: Can you bring me a few of these?
You mean, to sell?
-Yeah. -Oh, I have so many more.
-Tons more. -Even way cooler ones.
translation.zh:
‎-多的不得了
‎-还有更酷的版本

translation.en: Like way, way cooler.
Then I guess you'll have to bring those too.
I will.
That was amazing. I'm so proud of you.
I'm so proud of us. Look at us, girl bosses bossin' it up.
translation.zh:
‎我太为我们自豪了
‎看看我们 巾帼不让须眉

translation.en: -It's amazing. -We're livin' the dream.
-Boom. -Whoo! High five!
Medium five? Or low?
This is only because you said that nice thing about me.
translation.zh: ‎这只是因为你为我说了好话

translation.en: [Dunk] So I got you some things for your first day.
translation.zh: ‎所以我为你的第一天准备了些东西

translation.en: Here you go. It's three water bottles.
-You can put those anywhere. -Thank you.
Some throat coat tea, and a kettle to warm up the water for the throat coat tea,
translation.zh: ‎一些润喉茶 还有热茶用的茶壶

translation.en: 'cause otherwise, you're just drinkin' water.
Some, uh… Some lozenges, which, if you could take those right there.
translation.zh: ‎还有一些润喉糖 你可以都拿着

translation.en: -Cool. -Oh, but that's not all.
And a snack. I know you like to snack. Last but not least,
translation.zh:
‎还有零食 我知道你喜欢零食
‎最后也是最重要的

translation.en: I got you a pitch pipe for singing.
translation.zh: ‎我为你准备了唱歌的定调管

translation.en: I got myself one too, because they're awesome.
translation.zh:
‎我给自己也准备了一个
‎因为它们太棒了

translation.en: -[giggles] Right. -[blows note]
That's beautiful! [laughs]
-Thank you. This is perfect. -Yeah?
I just want you to have a good first rehearsal, and I'll just…
translation.zh: ‎我希望你的第一次排练顺利

translation.en: I'll be… hangin' out until you're done.
translation.zh: ‎我希望你的第一次排练顺利 ‎我会到处走走 直到你结束

translation.en: You must have something better to do than sit around and wait for me.
translation.zh:
‎你别光坐着等我
‎去找点其他的事情做吧

translation.en: [laughing] Yeah! I do.
I have to feed my fish.
You don't have a fish.
-I have to buy a fish. And then feed it. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎我得去买条鱼 然后喂它

translation.en: -Okay. -For sure.
Whew. Here I go.
Good luck.
Thank you.
-[girl 1] Hi! -[girl 2] Hi!
-Okay. -[voice] You're way out of your league.
And they all know it.
Kimmy should be the lead.
-[girl] Kimmy! -[echoing] And you know it… know it…
[Jodi] Oh, shoot. Sorry. Sorry.
Hello, Kim. We meet again.
translation.zh: ‎你好 基姆 我们又见面了

translation.en: It's-- It's Jodi, actually.
But you're playing Kim, and I'm playing Conrad.
translation.zh: ‎但是你要演基姆 我会演康拉德

translation.en: -Yeah. Right. -Let me help you with all this, please.
translation.zh:
‎-对 是的
‎-我来帮你接下这些

translation.en: -Thank you. -Jeez.
-Got a lot. -Oh, yeah. Yeah, you do.
-Okay… -Aah…
Seen the rehearsal schedule?
translation.zh:
‎-你看彩排安排了吗？
‎-不 还没有

translation.en: -No, not yet. -Oh, it's nuts.
translation.zh:
‎-你看彩排安排了吗？
‎-不 还没有 ‎太疯狂了 接下来这个月
‎我们基本每时每刻都会呆在一起

translation.en: We're basically spending every second together for the next month, so…
translation.zh:
‎太疯狂了 接下来这个月
‎我们基本每时每刻都会呆在一起

translation.en: Yeah. You're gonna get sick of seeing my face, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: ‎你会看我的脸看到想吐的 对不起

translation.en: No, you're gonna get sick of seeing my face.
translation.zh: ‎不 你会看我的脸看到想吐

translation.en: That's impossible.
No, seriously, you're just gonna look at me one day and be like… [babbles]
translation.zh:
‎说真的 有一天你会看着我
‎然后就…

translation.en: I'm really nervous. Sorry, I don't know if you can tell. I just--
translation.zh:
‎我真有点紧张 对不起
‎我不知道你能不能看出来 但我真是…

translation.en: -It's fine. [laughs] -Right. Okay.
It's just tall people aren't really known for their coordination.
translation.zh: ‎高个子的协调性真的不好说

translation.en: You got this.
[woman] Goodbye.
-Oof! -Oh my God.
Jodi, you have the first line.
translation.zh: ‎乔蒂 第一句台词是你的

translation.en: Oh, I must have missed that. Sorry.
-Yeah, along with the rest of your lines. -♪ Oh yeah ♪
[Madeline] Let's try that again.
translation.zh: ‎我们再试一次 这就开始

translation.en: -Sorry. Shoot! Sorry, sorry, sorry. -Oh!
-[piano keys jangle] -You're making it worse!
-Christian! -It's fine. See?
[murmurs] Sorry.
First week of rehearsals is the hardest.
Especially with you trying to psych me out from the sidelines.
translation.zh: ‎特别是你在我旁边一惊一乍

translation.en: -There's no shame in quitting. -Why would I quit?
translation.zh:
‎-退出不是什么丢人的事
‎-我为什么要退出？

translation.en: Because when the time comes
for you to be standing on stage in front of a packed audience,
blinded by the lights, sweat pouring down your face,
translation.zh:
‎你会被灯光照得看不见
‎脸上汗如雨下

translation.en: you know deep down you'll choke.
Hey, she won't choke. She's gonna be amazing.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 她不会搞砸 她会表现得很好

translation.en: Whatever. You two deserve each other.
translation.zh: ‎随便吧 你们两个开心就好

translation.en: Hey, look, I don't know why you just stuck up for me but… thank you.
translation.zh:
‎嘿 听着 我不知道你们为什么
‎因为我而闹得不愉快 但还是…谢谢

translation.en: Yeah, my pleasure.
Yeah, so, um,
do you ever think about that time we kissed?
translation.zh: ‎你会想起我们上次的接吻吗？

translation.en: [laughs] No.
Right. Me too.
Every day. [chuckles]
I'm just…
-Oh no. Oh! -[clattering]
Aah! Asparagus! Okay, come on. Come on. Oh boy.
translation.zh: ‎芦笋 好吧 拜托了 天啊

translation.en: Please.
Oh no!
Oh, come on. Come on, come on!
Ah, no! You burned the chicken stuffed in the duck stuffed in the turkey?
translation.zh:
‎不会吧！
‎你把火鸡里的鸭子里的鸡烤焦了？

translation.en: It's a turducken, Dad. Yeah, I ruined it.
translation.zh:
‎-这是火鸡鸭 爸爸 是的 我搞糟了
‎-我说过让你烤鸡就好

translation.en: I told you to go with roasted chicken. You flew too close to the sun.
translation.zh:
‎-这是火鸡鸭 爸爸 是的 我搞糟了
‎-我说过让你烤鸡就好 ‎-你飞得离太阳太近了
‎-我不想只是求稳

translation.en: -I didn't want to play safe. I don't know. -What is burning in here?
translation.zh:
‎-你飞得离太阳太近了
‎-我不想只是求稳 ‎这里什么烧着了？

translation.en: The dinner I'm making for Jodi, who'll be here in an hour.
translation.zh:
‎我在给乔蒂准备晚饭
‎她一小时后就过来

translation.en: -Ooh, what's the occasion? -Three-month anniversary.
That's so massive at your age, and now the night is a tur-dumpster fire.
translation.zh:
‎这对你这个年纪来说是很重要
‎但今晚的火鸡鸭算是歇菜了

translation.en: -How is that helpful? -Sorry. At all?
translation.zh:
‎-这么说有用吗？有用吗？
‎-对不起

translation.en: -Mm-hm. -I got you, Dunkers Seniors.
[dad] You two boys work it out. Don't get me in trouble with Mom.
translation.zh:
‎你们男孩忙吧
‎别给我和你妈妈找麻烦

translation.en: Hey. Hey, man. What are you doing?
We've less than an hour to cook. Not much, Dunkers.
translation.zh:
‎我们备菜的时间只有一个小时不到了
‎时间不多 邓柯儿

translation.en: -Give me a hand and chop these onions. -Oh.
Onions? Are you trying to sabotage me?
I need them in the pan ASAP if they're to caramelize. Chop-chop.
translation.zh:
‎我需要让它们在锅里焦糖化
‎你快切吧

translation.en: I haven't talked to you in months. Now you'll help me?
translation.zh:
‎我们好几个月没说过话
‎而你现在要帮忙？

translation.en: Do you want to impress your girlfriend, or sit here and chitchat? Hmm?
translation.zh:
‎你是要让她惊艳
‎还是就这么叽叽喳喳？

translation.en: Yes, chef. Sorry, chef.
translation.zh: ‎好的 大厨 对不起 大厨

translation.en: For your first course, Dunkers here has prepared bruschetta
translation.zh:
‎你们的第一道菜
‎邓柯儿为您准备了意式烤面包

translation.en: topped with roasted tomatoes, caramelized onions,
translation.zh: ‎上面是烤番茄 焦糖洋葱

translation.en: and if I may be so bold, it pairs very nicely with the iced teas.
translation.zh: ‎我冒昧说一句 它和冰茶非常搭配

translation.en: I hope you enjoy.
-I'm going to go check on the pasta. Ciao. -[both laugh]
translation.zh:
‎我回去看看意大利面 ‎-回见
‎-这是怎么回事？

translation.en: [Jodi] What was that?
He offered to wait on us. I wasn't gonna turn him down.
translation.zh: ‎他说要为我们服务 我不想拒绝他

translation.en: [laughs] Just make sure you-- you leave him a nice tip.
-I thought you were paying. -Am I now?
-Dad? Dad, what are you doing? -You're just killing it right now.
translation.zh:
‎-爸爸？你在干嘛？
‎-你们现在太好了

translation.en: Okay, bounce now.
-There you go. Thank you, Dad. -[shutter clicks]
translation.zh: ‎你可以走了 谢谢你 爸爸

translation.en: -Okay. [laughs] -I don't know!
Before we eat, I'd like to make a toast. Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-开动之前 我想说两句
‎-好

translation.en: I just want to say how happy I am
translation.zh:
‎我只是想说
‎今晚能和你坐在这里

translation.en: to be sitting here with you tonight.
And to watch you face your fears
and chase this big dream
of performing in front of people
is truly inspiring.
[voice] A dream that you know will never happen. -[echoing] …never happen… -[Stig] Dunkers…
translation.zh: ‎你知道这个梦想永远不会实现的

translation.en: Once you bomb, he'll say, "Bye Bye Jodi… Bye Bye Jodi…"
translation.zh:
‎只要你失败了
‎他就会说：“欢乐乔蒂”

translation.en: So enjoy tonight,
because there won't be a four-month anniversary.
translation.zh: ‎因为不会有四个月的纪念日了

translation.en: -Anniversary… -Jodi? Jodi!
Yeah! Yeah.
Are you okay? I'm sorry. It looked like you were spacing out.
translation.zh:
‎你还好吗？对不起
‎看起来你像是走神了

translation.en: -I'm sorry. My-- -It's okay.
My mind is just… elsewhere.
I'm under so much pressure for the show, but I've been looking forward to this night.
translation.zh:
‎这个表演让我压力好大
‎但是我很期待

translation.en: No, don't worry about it. I get it.
Look, if you need this time to rehearse or memorize your lines…
translation.zh:
‎听着 如果你现在需要
‎去排练或者记台词

translation.en: I don't know your process--
translation.zh: ‎我不知道你们的流程 但是…

translation.en: -No, no, I'm not-- -But whatever you need to do.
translation.zh:
‎-不 我不是…
‎-你做什么都可以

translation.en: I'm not leaving in the middle of our anniversary dinner, okay?
translation.zh: ‎我不会离开纪念日晚餐 好吗？

translation.en: Well, if you felt like you needed to, I would understand.
translation.zh: ‎如果你觉得自己需要 我会理解的

translation.en: How did I get so lucky?
Pretty amazing.
-Thank you. -Yeah.
-Right. -Okay.
What? Huh?
What? Wait… Wh…
Are you actually leaving?
Well, you just-- You just said you didn't mind.
Yeah. Okay.
-So you do mind? -A little.
Then you just… You shouldn't have said it.
I didn't think you would actually do it.
Pasta primavera!
Fine. I'll stay.
-Don't do me any favors. -What is that supposed to mean?
translation.zh:
‎-别给我留什么面子
‎-这是什么意思？

translation.en: Uh, parmigiano. No?
No.
-Okay. -[Dunk scoffs]
Jodi, you're like Miss Popular now at school.
translation.zh: ‎乔蒂 你现在在学校受欢迎了

translation.en: Every time we walk down the hallway, it's always, "Jodi!" "Mikey!"
translation.zh: ‎每次我们在走廊里总是 ‎“乔蒂！” “迈奇！”

translation.en: "Hey, can I buy you coffee sometime?" I mean,
translation.zh: ‎“什么时候能请你喝杯咖啡吗？”

translation.en: why would the star of the spring musical have time for little old Dunks anymore?
translation.zh:
‎春季音乐剧之星
‎怎么可能有时间搭理小邓柯儿呢？

translation.en: -[sighs] -Am I a burden to you? -That's what it feels like. -No.
translation.zh:
‎-我是你的负担吗？我感觉是这样
‎-不是

translation.en: I just didn't know that's how you feel.
translation.zh: ‎我只是不知道你会有这种感觉

translation.en: Do you know how many candles I lit for this? This was a big deal.
translation.zh:
‎你知道我为你点了多少蜡烛吗？
‎真的很多

translation.en: I've actually lost my appetite, so…
translation.zh: ‎我已经没有胃口了 所以…

translation.en: I'm gonna go.
Come on.
-Want me to wrap something up for you? -[Jodi] No, I'm okay. Thanks, Stig.
translation.zh:
‎-要我为您打包点什么吗？
‎-不 没事 谢谢你 斯蒂格

translation.en: Let me just grab one with a flash. And there's my handsome boy.
translation.zh:
‎让我开个闪光再拍一张
‎我的帅气男孩

translation.en: You should go over there right now and talk it out.
translation.zh: ‎你应该现在就过去把事情说开

translation.en: But he is the one who said it was okay that I left.
translation.zh: ‎但是 是他说我可以离开的

translation.en: No, Jodi, he was being nice.
translation.zh: ‎不 乔蒂 他只是客气

translation.en: You are the ones who are always telling me to stand up for myself.
translation.zh: ‎你们总是告诉我要为自己说话

translation.en: Why should I be the first to crack?
There is no shame in cracking first.
-Actually, there is. -Yeah.
Were you guys eavesdropping?
If you crack first, Dunkleman is gonna hold all the cards in the relationship.
translation.zh: ‎如果你先开口 ‎那他就占据主动权了

translation.en: Now, I know you kids think that love is about communication and give-and-take.
translation.zh:
‎我知道你们这些孩子觉得
‎爱是沟通和妥协

translation.en: -Well, it's not. -No.
[mom] Relationships are about power.
-Who has it, and who doesn't. -That's right.
translation.zh:
‎-有些人有 有些人没有
‎-没错

translation.en: So I say, let Dunkleman sweat it out, and you focus on your show.
translation.zh:
‎听我的 把邓柯曼晾一会儿
‎你专注在表演上

translation.en: Oh, which reminds me, we need 27 tickets for opening night.
translation.zh:
‎你提醒了我
‎开幕表演我们要27张票

translation.en: -No, wait, 28. Dr. Seeger. -Oh. Right.
translation.zh:
‎-不 等等 28张 还有西格医生
‎-对

translation.en: You invited my pediatrician?
Eh-- Look, I text Dunkleman, and I invited your pediatrician.
translation.zh:
‎听着 我是给邓柯曼发过信息
‎我是邀请了你的儿科医生

translation.en: Please, let me live.
Dr. Seeger probably saw me on the Tok.
translation.zh: ‎西格医生可能在短视频里看过我

translation.en: -[dad] Huh? -[mom] The Tickety Tok.
I was doin' all of that. I was plugging your show, though.
translation.zh:
‎我就这么来着
‎但是我有推广你的表演

translation.en: -You're on TikTok? -You don't follow me?
Jodi, focus!
What's it gonna be?
Don't worry, they're gonna sell.
-I'm not worried. -I mean, it's only been a week.
Which is why I'm not worried.
-And you shouldn't be either. -I just-- I can't help it. I'm a worrier.
translation.zh:
‎-你也别紧张
‎-我忍不住 这操心的命

translation.en: Yes, we've met.
Lookin' beautiful as ever, Kim.
translation.zh: ‎你还是一如既往的美啊 基姆

translation.en: You're too kind, Conrad. [chuckles]
Who was that?
My costar.
Conrad?
No. Tommy. Conrad is his character name.
translation.zh: ‎不 汤米 康拉德是他的角色名字

translation.en: Well, Tommy thinks you're beautiful.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 汤米觉得你很漂亮

translation.en: No. That was just his character saying that to my character, Kim.
translation.zh:
‎不是 那是他的角色
‎对我的角色基姆说的台词

translation.en: Well, this is Fareeda telling Jodi that Tommy thinks you're beautiful.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 现在是法丽达在告诉乔蒂
‎汤米觉得你很漂亮

translation.en: Explain to me again why you can't crack first?
translation.zh:
‎你倒是解释一下
‎为什么你不能先开口？

translation.en: Because I've been chasing her my entire life.
If I just hold my ground, I can win this fight.
translation.zh: ‎如果我挺住了 就能赢下这场战斗

translation.en: -Nobody wins in this kind of fight. -This is America. There's always a winner.
translation.zh:
‎这种战斗没有赢家 ‎-这里是美国 总有人是赢家
‎-和输家

translation.en: [Stig] Pfft. And a loser.
translation.zh:
‎-这里是美国 总有人是赢家
‎-和输家

translation.en: There's my guy!
So, I know things got a little heated the other day,
translation.zh: ‎我知道那天我们有点不愉快

translation.en: and we said some things we didn't mean,
and I think we should just forget it even happened.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得我们应该忘掉发生过什么

translation.en: And to sweeten the deal, I promise to lay off Jodi the Green Giant.
translation.zh:
‎为了让你好受一些
‎我保证会让绿巨人乔蒂下台

translation.en: Do you know why I joined the crew?
translation.zh: ‎你知道我为什么会去幕后吗？

translation.en: It's because I saw how upset you were when you didn't get the lead.
translation.zh:
‎因为我知道你没拿到主演
‎有多么的不安

translation.en: And I knew that having a friend by your side during rehearsals
translation.zh:
‎我知道在排练的时候
‎有个朋友在身边

translation.en: would help you through it.
Name one time you've been there for someone who needed you.
translation.zh:
‎说一次当别人需要你的时候
‎你在身旁的例子

translation.en: What, you want, like, specific dates?
translation.zh: ‎什么 你说某个具体的约会？

translation.en: If we're gonna be friends, I need to know you've changed,
translation.zh:
‎如果我们重新和好
‎我得知道你已经改变了

translation.en: something you've made clear you don't wanna do.
But I believe that you have a good heart,
so I hope you'll reconsider.
Wait. You're making me eat lunch alone?
translation.zh: ‎等等 你是要让我一个人吃午餐？

translation.en: On some level, we all eat lunch alone.
translation.zh:
‎某种程度上来说
‎我们都是在独自吃午餐

translation.en: -Oh, this is going to be so uncomfortable. -Why?
'Cause I don't do well with open tension.
translation.zh: ‎因为我处理不好公开的剑拔弩张

translation.en: -Can you just be cool, please? -All right.
translation.zh:
‎你能稍微冷静点吗？ ‎-对不起 酷男先生来报到了
‎-斯蒂格

translation.en: -Mr. Cool Guy reporting for duty. -Oh, Stig.
translation.zh:
‎-对不起 酷男先生来报到了
‎-斯蒂格

translation.en: -Okay, come on. Somebody crack! -[hits table]
translation.zh: ‎好了 拜托 谁先开个口吧

translation.en: Dude, I had it.
I have nothing to say to him.
-You've got nothing to say to me? -No.
Not even, say, an apology? For bailing on our anniversary dinner?
translation.zh:
‎就连道歉都没有？
‎放了我们纪念日晚餐的鸽子？

translation.en: You said I could.
You know, maybe instead of attacking each other,
you could try to articulate what it is you want.
translation.zh:
‎而是试着阐述一下
‎你们需要对方怎么样

translation.en: -Fareeda, excellent point. -Mmm. Let's unpack our wants.
translation.zh: ‎法丽达 说得好 让我们把需求说开

translation.en: Okay, fine. What I want is a girlfriend with a better work-life balance.
translation.zh:
‎好 我需要的是
‎一个能更好平衡工作和生活的女友

translation.en: I don't know what you want.
A girlfriend with a better work-life balance. I said!
translation.zh: ‎一个能更好平衡工作和生活的女友

translation.en: So if two people just aren't getting what they want out of a relationship,
translation.zh:
‎假如一段关系中两个人
‎没能得到他们期待的东西

translation.en: what are they supposed to do?
Typically, they break up.
Stig.
I-- I mean, not they should break up. I just-- Oh my--
translation.zh:
‎我不是说他们应该分手
‎我只是 我的天…

translation.en: -I don't know, man. Clearly, she wants to. -Now he's projecting.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 很明显 她想 ‎现在是他提出来了

translation.en: I just think that you wanna break up, and you don't have the guts to say it.
translation.zh:
‎我只是觉得你想要分手
‎但你没有勇气说出来

translation.en: -You don't think I have the guts? -I don't think you have!
translation.zh:
‎-你觉得我没有勇气？
‎-我觉得你不敢！

translation.en: -I have the guts. -Really? Then say it!
You say it, if you have the guts to say it.
Fine. I want to break up!
-Great. -[Dunk] Great!
Why did I do that?
-[sighs] -I love citrus.
[Fareeda] Stig.
You would make a horrible therapist.
Yeah, I was pretty bad.
My dad's outside. He needs to see me.
translation.zh: ‎我爸爸在外面 他要见我

translation.en: Is everything okay?
[Dunk] Yeah, he's right here.
-Is everything okay? What's wrong? -Hold on. -I don't know. -Why are you here?
translation.zh:
‎-一切还好吗？你为什么来这里？
‎-不知道

translation.en: -Surprise! -[Stig] Oh my--
-What? -[girl laughing] Aaaah!
[Stig, in Swedish] What are you doing here? Visiting you,
dummy!
Who is this person?
-Stig's sister. -His sister?
Oh no. You rented more Swedes?
translation.zh: ‎不会吧 你又租房子给瑞典人了？

translation.en: We thought he'd appreciate having some family around,
translation.zh:
‎我们觉得有家人在身旁
‎他会开心些

translation.en: since you've been ignoring him for three months.
I didn't know he had a sister.
That's because you don't talk to him.
Everyone, this is Stella.
Stella, this is Fareeda, and Jodi,
translation.zh: ‎斯黛拉 这是法丽达 还有乔蒂

translation.en: and that is Dunkers.
Dunkers?
Hey. Hi.
Oh, you're even more adorable than your pictures.
-I am? -Yeah.
He is?
And I can't believe I'm meeting the girl who broke my little brother's heart.
translation.zh:
‎我不敢相信自己终于见到了
‎这个伤透了我弟弟心的女孩

translation.en: -Well-- -He called me that night in tears.
translation.zh: ‎你知道吗 他晚上哭着打电话给我

translation.en: -It was allergies. -"Who's going to love me?"
I was a mess.
Oh, I can't wait for you to show me the city! Aah!
translation.zh: ‎我等不急去参观这个城市了！

translation.en: I've got time now. Who's gonna come?
translation.zh: ‎我现在有时间 谁一起去？

translation.en: [chuckles] I've got PE.
-Calculus. -Oof.
-What about you, Dunkers? -Uh… Hm? Me?
Dunkers is in.
-[Stig] Yes! -[Dunk] Yeah!
-Slam dunk! Whoo! -[Stella] Let's do this.
-Yes! [chuckles] -Come on.
[dad] Seat belts, gang. Seat belts.
translation.zh: ‎安全带 各位 安全带

translation.en: All right, Dad. Come on, back off.
translation.zh: ‎好了 爸爸 拜托 别吵了

translation.en: How was school today, bud? Who'd you play with?
translation.zh:
‎今天在学校怎么样 小伙子？
‎你和谁玩了？

translation.en: [voice] Looks like there's a new tall girl in town.
translation.zh: ‎看来镇上有新的高个女孩了

translation.en: And she just drove off with your boyfriend… boyfriend…
translation.zh: ‎他刚刚和你男朋友开车离开了

translation.en: Sorry, ex-boyfriend. Perfect timing.
translation.zh: ‎对不起 前男友 完美时机

translation.en: -[Fareeda] Jodi? -Yeah?
Are you okay?
Dunk and I just… just broke up.
Aw, Jodi.
So, how's Ingvar?
-[retches] -Amazing.
-[Stig] Ew. -He says hi.
Wait, are you guys talking about Ingvar Kruger?
You know Ingvar?
Stig said he's the best-looking, coolest guy in your entire country.
translation.zh:
‎斯蒂格说他是你们全国
‎最帅最酷的家伙

translation.en: -Are you guys dating? -Yes, and he completes my soul.
translation.zh:
‎-你们是在约会吗？
‎-对 他让我的灵魂都变得完整了

translation.en: Well, cherish each other.
Because at any moment, it could just all be over.
He and Jodi broke up.
-That can't be! -[Dunk groans] You two are destined to be together.
translation.zh:
‎不可能吧！
‎你们两个是天作之合

translation.en: -Destined to be together? -That's what Stig told me.
translation.zh:
‎-天作之合？
‎-是斯蒂格告诉我的

translation.en: What? When?
The night he called to say he blew it with Jodi.
He said that what made the whole thing even worse
was he blew his chance to be friends with you.
translation.zh: ‎他失去了和你做朋友的时间

translation.en: -He doesn't have many of those back home. -You never said anything.
translation.zh:
‎-他在家的时候没什么朋友
‎-你从没说过

translation.en: You never asked.
I guess you're kind of right.
I never asked about your friends or your family or anything about you.
translation.zh:
‎我从来没有问过你的朋友
‎你的家人或者你的其他事情

translation.en: I think I kind of blew my chance of being friends with you too.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得是我搞砸了
‎和你做朋友的机会

translation.en: You did, you jerk.
-Course not, Dunkers! I love you! [laughs] -[Dunk] All right.
translation.zh:
‎-当然没有了 邓柯儿！我爱你！
‎-好吧

translation.en: What do you think you're doing?
Just working through some Jodi feelings I've kept locked inside.
translation.zh:
‎就是把内心对乔蒂的感情
‎表现出来

translation.en: What Jodi feelings?
Love and loss, bro.
You didn't lose her, though. I did.
translation.zh: ‎你又没有失去她 是我失去了她

translation.en: I lost her a little bit.
No, I'm saying you can't lose someone a little bit. You lose them or you don't.
translation.zh:
‎你不能有点失去某个人
‎要么就是失去 要么就是没失去

translation.en: Who'd have thought the love of our lives would be the same person?
translation.zh:
‎谁能想到我们生命中的爱人
‎竟然是同一个人？

translation.en: -But you-- -This is crazy.
You made out with her in an escape room for, like, six seconds. That's not love.
translation.zh:
‎你只是在密室逃脱里跟她亲热了六秒
‎那不是爱

translation.en: Then why is my heart still trapped in that escape room?
translation.zh: ‎那为什么我的心还留在密室里？

translation.en: I'm not your therapist.
Listen, now that you and Jodi are broken up,
translation.zh: ‎听着 既然你已经和乔蒂分手了

translation.en: think you could put in a good word for me?
-You missed a spot. -Hey, no.
-Too late. -No.
[voice] You definitely failed that calculus test.
Maybe college isn't in the cards for you either.
-Jodi! -Mikey…
[voice] It's getting real. There's no turning back… turning back…
translation.zh: ‎事情成真了 现在回不了头了

translation.en: -You're in too deep now… too deep now… -[heartbeat]
If you're this nervous looking at a poster,
what are you gonna do on stage?
-Getting psyched for opening night? -Yeah, so psyched.
translation.zh:
‎-很期待开幕的那晚吧？
‎-对 很期待

translation.en: [voice] But look at Kimmy. So poised, so confident.
translation.zh:
‎（周五
‎3月29日 晚上7点） ‎但是 看看基姆啊
‎如此镇定 如此自信

translation.en: For God's sake, the name of the role is Kim!
translation.zh: ‎天啊 简直就是基姆本人！

translation.en: Just quit and let her have it.
Jodi, breathe.
What?
You're holding your breath.
Oh. I was. [chuckles]
Do you ever find it nerve-racking to watch your understudies rehearse?
translation.zh: ‎你看着替补排练时会觉得紧张吗？

translation.en: Not really. No.
[chuckles] Of course not. Because you don't get nervous.
translation.zh: ‎当然不会 因为你不会紧张

translation.en: Now, why wouldn't you think I get nervous, huh?
I mean, look at you.
Wow. Okay, so you've been judged your whole life based on your appearance,
translation.zh:
‎哇 你这一辈子一直因为样貌
‎被人指指点点

translation.en: and now you're doing the same thing to me?
translation.zh: ‎现在却对我做同样的事情吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I did just do the same thing.
translation.zh: ‎对 我做的是一样的事情

translation.en: -It's okay. -Sorry.
One of the reasons why I can remember every word of your homecoming speech
translation.zh: ‎我能记住你返校节演讲每个字的原因

translation.en: is because of how much I related to it.
In what way?
I'll show you.
-So this is where it happened. -Where what happened?
translation.zh:
‎-就是在这里发生的
‎-在哪里发生了什么？

translation.en: That was impressive! [laughs]
Thank you.
This is the place where I got my nickname
translation.zh: ‎我就是在这里得到了一个外号

translation.en: that lasted all the way throughout middle school.
Tommy-potamus. Yeah.
You… You were overweight?
Oh, yeah. Way over.
How far over?
Far enough to where I'd be going down that slide, and kids would just yell,
translation.zh:
‎严重到我只要走到滑梯那里
‎就会有孩子大叫

translation.en: "Tommy-potamus is on the slide!" -"Earthquake! Take cover!" -Oh!
translation.zh:
‎“河墩子汤米来滑梯了！
‎地震了！躲起来！”

translation.en: -Creative. -Isn't it? -Mm. Yeah. [giggles] -Yeah.
I don't know, I just-- I started exercising and eating right
translation.zh:
‎我不知道了
‎我开始运动 合理饮食

translation.en: and got the weight off eventually.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道了
‎我开始运动 合理饮食 ‎终于减掉了重量
‎但是我内心还是一样的感觉

translation.en: But I still felt the same way inside.
translation.zh:
‎终于减掉了重量
‎但是我内心还是一样的感觉

translation.en: For me, it's movie theaters.
translation.zh: ‎对我来说 伤心地是电影院

translation.en: I've had so much stuff thrown at my head because I'm blocking the screen.
translation.zh:
‎我脑海里会有很多想法
‎因为我挡住了荧幕

translation.en: -[laughs] I see. -I can't totally relax in movie theaters.
translation.zh:
‎-我懂
‎-我在电影院里无法彻底放松

translation.en: I think I'm just sitting there waiting to get pelted by popcorn.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得自己坐在那里
‎就是等着被爆米花丢

translation.en: Well, hey. If we ever do go to the movies,
I am more than happy to sit in the back row with you, so…
translation.zh: ‎我会很愿意坐在你后面 所以…

translation.en: Well, you will be miserable, so I will buy the popcorn.
translation.zh: ‎你会很惨的 我去给你买爆米花

translation.en: I could never be miserable hanging out with you.
translation.zh: ‎和你在一起我永远不会觉得惨

translation.en: [laughs] It's-- It's funny, um…
I've… I've never thought of guys dealing with the same weight issues that girls do.
translation.zh:
‎我从来没有想过
‎男孩会和女孩一样有体重问题

translation.en: Yeah, those experiences just get hardwired into our brains.
translation.zh: ‎对 那些经历固定在我们的脑海里

translation.en: Totally shapes who we are and how we think.
translation.zh: ‎彻底塑造了我们的性格和思考方式

translation.en: Do you think it's possible for us to…
I don't know, rewire our brains
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 重新调整思路吗？

translation.en: so that we don't get those negative thoughts?
I don't know. Let's give it a shot.
May I have this dance, Kim?
translation.zh: ‎我能和你跳支舞吗 基姆？

translation.en: What? You-- You want to rehearse here?
Look, Jodi, this place has been just one big, bad memory for me.
translation.zh:
‎听着 乔蒂 对我来说
‎这里是很重大、很糟糕的回忆

translation.en: Maybe you can help me turn it into a good one.
translation.zh:
‎也许你可以帮我把它
‎变成美好的回忆

translation.en: -[music plays] -All right. -Guess so. -Yeah.
-Okay. -[both laugh]
[Fareeda] What?
I knew Conrad liked you.
Okay, Tommy.
Whoever. I have so many questions.
translation.zh:
‎-好吧 是汤米
‎-爱谁谁吧 ‎我有好多问题

translation.en: Question one. Do you want it to happen again?
translation.zh:
‎问题一
‎你还希望再发生一次吗？

translation.en: I don't know.
Question two. Does that mean you want to get back together with Dunk?
translation.zh:
‎问题二
‎这代表着你想要和邓柯儿复合吗？

translation.en: I don't know. I mean, maybe Dunk's the one I'm supposed to be with.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道
‎也许邓柯儿才是那个对的人

translation.en: -[groans] Okay, why do I feel so guilty? -Because you and Dunk just broke up.
translation.zh:
‎-好吧 为什么我觉得那么内疚？
‎-因为你和邓柯儿才刚分手

translation.en: But make no mistake, you are free to kiss whoever you want.
translation.zh:
‎但是你没错
‎你可以自由地去亲你想亲的人

translation.en: -I know. -But so is Dunk.
I know. I just… I would like to believe that if he did,
translation.zh: ‎我知道 我只是希望如果他那么做了

translation.en: he would have enough respect to tell me so I wouldn't hear it from somebody else.
translation.zh:
‎他能够尊重我并告诉我
‎这样我就不用从别人那里听说了

translation.en: -[Fareeda] Then you know what to do. -Yeah, I do.
translation.zh:
‎-那你就知道该做什么了
‎-对 我知道

translation.en: -Boom. -Oh, snap.
-Here it is. Ready? Five, six. -♪ But it's our song, so here we go ♪
translation.zh:
‎-开始了 好了？五、六
‎-这是我们的歌 这就开始了

translation.en: ♪ I don't care who you are… ♪
-[laughs] ♪ Where you're from ♪
♪ What you did ♪
♪ As long as you love me ♪
We're never gonna break up.
[Jodi] Never.
-[Dunk] We're perfect. -[Jodi] Mwah!
Whatcha doin'?
Hey! Don't you ever knock?
You've been in here for over an hour. I was worried.
translation.zh:
‎你已经在这里呆了一个小时了
‎我很担心

translation.en: -[Dunk] I'm fine. -You're not fine.
You're watching videos of you and Jodi again?
translation.zh: ‎你又在看你和乔蒂的视频吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I can hear through the door.
I'm deleting them, okay?
[Stig] How many have you deleted so far?
None. But I was about to before you barged in and interrupted me.
translation.zh:
‎还没有 但是在你闯进来打扰我之前
‎我正准备这么做

translation.en: -Okay. Stella, come quick! -Don't--
translation.zh: ‎好了 斯黛拉 快点来！

translation.en: -She won't want to miss this. -[Dunk] Don't bring her into this.
translation.zh:
‎-她不想错过这一幕
‎-别把她牵扯进来

translation.en: What's up?
Dunkleman was just about to delete all the videos of him and Jodi.
translation.zh: ‎他准备删除他和乔蒂的所有视频

translation.en: Yeah.
-[Stella] Really? -Yeah.
-[Stella] Bold. -Yeah.
But smart. Erase any memory of the relationship.
translation.zh:
‎但是放聪明点
‎抹掉这段关系的所有记忆

translation.en: -Beignet? -Always.
Oh, everyone knows when you eat these, you don't inhale.
translation.zh:
‎大家都知道吃这些玩意的时候
‎不能大喘气

translation.en: Look, I know you guys don't believe me. -[coughing] -[Dunk] But check this out.
translation.zh:
‎听着 我知道你们不信
‎但是都给我看好了

translation.en: Eighty-seven videos checked, and…
they're deleted. They're gone. What are you doing?
translation.zh:
‎已经删掉了
‎你拿我手机要干什么？

translation.en: The videos aren't truly deleted until you click "Delete permanently."
translation.zh:
‎没点击“永久删除”前
‎视频不会被删掉的

translation.en: Yeah. Good save.
We definitely want to make sure that these cherished memories
translation.zh:
‎我们要确认一下
‎这些对你来说很珍贵的记忆

translation.en: that meant so much to you are gone forever,
never to be seen or experienced again.
Yeah.
Like they never even happened, Dunk.
Yeah. After I press this button, they didn't. One--
translation.zh: ‎我按下这个键 他们就没了 一…

translation.en: -If so, I should-- -[Stig] And a half.
-Two. -[Dunk] Let me--
-[Stig] Two and a half. -Three! Fine! Uh-- You win!
I'm not okay!
I'm lost without her.
And I-- I want her back. Is that what you want to hear?
translation.zh:
‎我想让她回来
‎你们是想听我这么说吗？

translation.en: No, but I know someone else who might.
translation.zh: ‎不 但是我知道有人想听

translation.en: The, uh, mangoes are really fresh today, so… [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎你来了 今天的芒果很新鲜

translation.en: Oh, uh… peace offering?
Tradition.
So if we're, um, keeping with the traditions,
translation.zh: ‎如果我们还遵循以前的传统

translation.en: uh, are we still performing "As Long as You Love Me"
translation.zh:
‎那我们还会继续在
‎法丽达的生日派对上

translation.en: at Fareeda's birthday party?
It's gonna be the highlight of the night.
Cool.
-[chuckles] -I just can't even believe it.
They discounted your shirts by 20%?
Which is embarrassing enough.
But to make it even worse, I took my parents to the store,
translation.zh:
‎但是更难堪的是
‎我还带着父母去了

translation.en: thinking they'd be impressed.
translation.zh:
‎-我以为他们会被惊艳
‎-不会吧

translation.en: And they saw with their own eyes that their daughter,
translation.zh: ‎他们亲眼看到了自己的女儿

translation.en: who'd been talking up her big future as a designer,
translation.zh: ‎吹嘘未来会做设计师的女儿

translation.en: had been marked down.
So, um, I-- I just want to say how sorry I am for leaving our dinner.
translation.zh:
‎我想告诉你
‎晚餐没吃完我就走了 很抱歉

translation.en: No, I'm sorry for overreacting.
translation.zh: ‎不 我为小题大做而道歉

translation.en: [laughs] Yeah.
Are we cool?
Yeah, we're-- we're cool.
I choked at my Bye Bye Birdie audition.
That was one time.
It happens every time.
-Honestly, I've never even been in a show. -What?
translation.zh:
‎-老实说 我还从来没演过戏
‎-什么？

translation.en: When I met Jodi, I acted like I had been in Cats,
translation.zh:
‎我遇到乔蒂的时候
‎假装自己演过《猫》

translation.en: 'cause I wanted to impress her. -Duh. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎因为我想惊艳她 但是吧

translation.en: If I'm goofing around at the piano, yeah, I can hold a tune.
translation.zh:
‎如果让我在钢琴旁边
‎我能好好唱出来

translation.en: But the second I have to do it in front of other people…
Zhoop! I freeze.
Did you really think telling Jodi you were in Cats would impress her?

‎你觉得告诉她自己演过《猫》

translation.en: Or anyone?
If you are not moved by singing cats,

translation.en: you have no soul.
Well, good thing I'm a cat person.
Oh. Well, I'm a dog person, so I guess this is never going to work.

‎好吧 我喜欢狗
‎我猜永远都演不成戏了

translation.en: You know, there's something I need to tell you.
Really? 'Cause… 'Cause, you know, actually, so do I. Yeah.
-Oh, go first. -No, no, no, please, go ahead.
-[laughs] -Great. Okay. Um… [laughs nervously] Okay, um…
Whew. Okay, I'm just gonna-- I'm just gonna say it.
I kissed someone.
And I wanted you to hear it from me, because I really care about you.
translation.zh:
‎我希望是我告诉你
‎因为我真的在乎你

translation.en: That's something that's never gonna change.
I just… Dunkleman, wait. No, no, no, no, I… [sighs]

translation.en: -Come on, dude. Help me out. -This is crazy. Relax.
translation.zh:
‎-拜托 老兄 帮我一把
‎-太疯狂了 放松点

translation.en: Just hold the bag for me.
I just want everything that reminds me of her gone.
translation.zh:
‎我要把一切能让我想到她的东西
‎统统丢掉

translation.en: -Pictures, memories. Like this. -No.
translation.zh:
‎-照片 记忆 比如这个
‎-不

translation.en: Yeah. The Backstreet Boys.
It's gotta go. I can't do it!
What else? Come on. Get--
-Our future dogs! -No!
-They were. They're gone now! -No! Penelope and Fifi!
translation.zh:
‎-现在都要消失！
‎-不！佩内洛普和菲菲！

translation.en: No Dalmatians for Dunkers. Cat. All the cute animals. Especially the giraffe!
translation.zh:
‎邓柯儿不要斑点狗 猫
‎可爱的小动物 特别是长颈鹿！

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait. Why the giraffe?
Because tall!
-That's actually good sense. -Yes, I know.
translation.zh:
‎-还真能说得通
‎-对 我知道

translation.en: [Dunk] Please leave a message.
Come on, Dunk. Can't we talk this out?
translation.zh: ‎够了 我们能把话说开吗？

translation.en: [Dunk] Her favorite book. [laughs] Yeah, I read this for her.
translation.zh: ‎她最喜欢的书 对 我还给她读过

translation.en: Hey, just calling to place my smoothie order for tomorrow.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 我打电话是为了订明天的奶昔

translation.en: [Dunk] Never making a smoothie again. That can go.
translation.zh: ‎再也不做奶昔了 这个也可以丢掉

translation.en: Too soon? Yeah. Too soon.
Why are there so many photos? I didn't even look good in this one.
translation.zh:
‎为什么还有这么多照片？
‎这张的我不好看

translation.en: I'm gonna keep this for myself.
This isn't fair. We were broken up.
translation.zh: ‎这不公平 我们当时分手了

translation.en: The camera she got me for my 15th birthday.
translation.zh: ‎这个相机是她送我的15岁生日礼物

translation.en: This? This has gotta go. Catch.
Gone.
I think you'll regret throwing all this out.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得丢掉这些 你会后悔的

translation.en: I'm up to my ears in regret, so what's one more?
translation.zh: ‎我已经悔到耳朵根了 还能怎么样？

translation.en: -Hey! Oh! Oh no! -[weeping] -Oh no. What's happened? -[sniffles]
Ingvar has been cheating on me with Ebba Oloffson!
translation.zh:
‎英瓦和艾巴·奥洛夫森在一起
‎背叛了我

translation.en: What? How do you know?
Gunborg Bjork saw them kissing last night at the Jokkmokk Festival!
translation.zh:
‎冈伯格·比约克昨晚在约克莫克节上
‎看到他们接吻了！

translation.en: I just called Ingvar, and I said, "I'm done with you!"
translation.zh:
‎我刚打了电话
‎告诉他玩完了！

translation.en: -Good! -And relationships. Forever!
translation.zh:
‎-好！
‎-还有我们的关系 永远！

translation.en: Yes! Yes! You know, when I was in the second grade,
translation.zh: ‎对 你知道吗 我二年级的时候

translation.en: I wrote Jodi a note that said, "Will you go out with me? Yes or no?"
translation.zh:
‎给乔蒂写了张纸条
‎“你愿意和我出去吗？是或否？”

translation.en: And she wrote in "Maybe."
Our relationship was doomed from the start.
translation.zh:
‎我们的关系
‎从一开始就注定要玩完

translation.en: -We don't need them. -No, we don't.
translation.zh:
‎-我们不需要他们
‎-不 我们不需要

translation.en: -Delete permanently. -Yeah.
-Delete permanently. -Yeah!
-Delete permanently! -Nice!
I just had a great idea, Stella.
-You and I should form an alliance. -An alliance?
Let's say they want to get back together with us.
We can remind each other of this exact moment,
translation.zh:
‎我们可以提醒彼此
‎就是此时此刻

translation.en: and prevent each other from ever feeling this kind of pain again!
-I'm in! -Great!
[gasps] What about you?
I am not going to be a part of your stupid alliance.
translation.zh: ‎我才不要加入你们的愚蠢联盟

translation.en: Look, I've spent my entire life just waiting around for her.
translation.zh: ‎听着 我这一生都在等着她

translation.en: I have the bag of stuff to prove it.
translation.zh: ‎我有一大袋可以用来证明的东西

translation.en: Look at all this stuff. I've got… pictures in here. I've got mementos.
translation.zh:
‎看看这些东西
‎这里还有照片、纪念品

translation.en: The camera she bought me when I was 15.
translation.zh: ‎这台相机是15岁时她送给我的

translation.en: You know what? Maybe Jodi wasn't supposed to be my destiny.
translation.zh:
‎你们知道吗？
‎也许乔蒂不是我的天命之选

translation.en: Maybe this was the path I was supposed to go down. Photography.
translation.zh: ‎也许这才是我该选择的路 摄影

translation.en: Check it out. Who wants to be my first subject? Let's shoot.
translation.zh:
‎看看 谁想成为我的首个拍照对象？
‎我们去拍照

translation.en: Forming the alliance is only phase one. All right? Phase two…
translation.zh:
‎阶段一是组成联盟 ‎阶段二是我们要告诉前任们
‎我们不需要他们

translation.en: Phase two is where we show our exes that we don't need them.
translation.zh:
‎阶段二是我们要告诉前任们
‎我们不需要他们

translation.en: -That we're living our best lives. -We don't need relationships to be happy.
translation.zh:
‎-我们过得很好
‎-我们不谈恋爱也很快乐

translation.en: Thank you, yes. That we're not…
dying inside.
I don't miss Ingvar at all.
Oh, right, yeah. Okay. How are you doing that? Got this leg up here.

translation.en: Okay. Oh, this is a little tougher than I…
Taking the picture. Here we go.
You hate yoga. You have a weak core.
translation.zh: ‎你恨瑜伽 你的核心很弱

translation.en: Well, those things are just dangerous. [scoffs]
translation.zh: ‎好吧 这些东西真的很危险

translation.en: Oh! The puppies! [gasps]
Oh my God, they're so… No!
Balloon animals? Are you five now?
Come on. It's not even Halloween.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 现在根本不是万圣节

translation.en: Why is she braiding his hair?
Okay, back to the puppies. I'm just going to crop them out.
translation.zh:
‎好了 回头看小狗
‎我要把它们裁下来

translation.en: They're cute.
-Hey, Harper, I really need to-- -Ah-buh-buh-buh-buh…

translation.en: Chess teaches focus, creative thinking, and how to be quick on your feet.

‎象棋能教人集中注意力
‎创造性思考 以及如何快速行动

translation.en: All of which are going to sharpen my interview skills.

translation.en: Checkmate! Hah! Wow, I did not see that coming.

I kissed somebody else and told him. Now he's not responding to me.

‎我吻了别人 然后告诉他了
‎现在他不回复我了

translation.en: It looks like he's living his best life!
And he even threw a puppy party! I mean--
Why is this the first I'm hearing about this?
You're leaving soon,
so I'm trying to wean myself off asking for advice when I have a problem.

‎我想试着在遇到问题的时候
‎不去询问建议

translation.en: I'm still here. Wean on me.
Okay, what do I do?
When Diego and I broke up, and I kissed Alexander--
translation.zh:
‎蒂亚戈和我分手的时候
‎我吻了亚历山大…

translation.en: Harper, this is not about you.
Right, I always forget that.

translation.en: Okay. If he's not returning texts or calls,

translation.en: you need to knock on his door and force him to talk things out.
translation.zh: ‎你就需要去敲门 逼他把事情说清楚

translation.en: What do I say?
You're an actress now. Let's improv.

translation.en: It'll be good practice for both of us. I'll be Dunkleman.

translation.en: Okay? And you be you.
-Ready? -Okay… Okay.
And action.
Okay, uh, Dunkleman, look, I know that you're probably really, really upset with me--

‎好吧 听着
‎我知道你很生我的气…

translation.en: Of course I'm upset.
You kissed someone else mere moments after we broke up.

‎所以过去的三个月
‎对你来说什么都不是吗？

‎-我每天给你做奶昔 乔蒂！

translation.en: -I know. No. -I stood on crates! You're a monster!

‎-我站在牛奶箱上！你这个怪物！

translation.en: Oh. Okay, so he's, like-- He's not going to say, like, any of that.

[sighs] Okay, okay. Good.
-Well, he might. -[knocking]
[Jodi] Stella?
Hi.
Is Dunkleman home?
Hello, Jodi.
[Jodi] Hi. Hi. [chuckles]
Wow, uh… [chuckles] I missed the memo, I guess.
Oh, the flannels?
We're trying to start a trend. Thanks for noticing.

translation.en: Sorry, but I don't need this anymore.
translation.zh: ‎对不起 但是这个我不需要了

translation.en: It was a gift.
It just doesn't feel right to keep it.
Good day.
Hello.
Hi.
So, uh, about the other night.
-Yeah, look. -Yeah. I had the best time.
translation.zh:
‎-听着 我过得很开心
‎-好吧

translation.en: But you didn't say anything to me afterwards. Or since, really, so…
-Yeah, I… [sighs] -[sighs]
My boyfriend and I had just broken up, and I mean just,
translation.zh: ‎我男朋友和我刚分手 我是说刚刚

translation.en: so I don't think I was expecting… that to happen so soon afterwards.

‎所以我觉得不应该期待
‎很快发生点什么

translation.en: We-- We don't have to rush into anything, okay?
I just-- I just wanna get to know you better.
Okay.
So, you, uh, going to the burning ceremony Saturday night?

translation.en: I heard something about that. [laughs] What is it exactly?
Well, it's before tech week starts.

translation.en: Some of the cast, they get together at, uh, Crescent Park.
Everyone brings a little something to throw in, you know.
Anything to help clear their minds,

translation.en: That sounds--
-Cheesy. I know, it is so cheesy. -[laughs] But it's gonna be great.

‎太感性了 我知道是很感性
‎但是会很好玩

‎我要去参加一个生日派对

translation.en: Maybe you can come to the bonfire first and hit up the party afterwards?

You're the lead. You should go.
It'll be fun.
Okay, I'll go.

‎-事实上…
‎-对 我要上…化学课

‎我的爸爸住在亚利桑那
‎他还从没看过我表演

translation.en: Every year, he says he'll try to make it out for one, and I believe him,
translation.zh:
‎每年他都说会试着过来看
‎我相信他了

translation.en: but he never comes, just sends a postcard.
translation.zh:
‎但是他从来没来过
‎只是寄一张明信片

translation.en: This is the year I stop believing.
Very nice.
Thank you.
All right, um… So, growing up,
I had such messed-up body issues
that I'd wear these oversized T-shirts so kids wouldn't make fun of me at school.
translation.zh:
‎我会穿着鞋超大号短袖
‎这样那些孩子们就不会取笑我了

translation.en: And of course, this did not help the matter.
Hey, hey, look, they were cool back in the day, just not on me, and it's all right.
translation.zh:
‎嘿 这衣服当时很酷
‎只是不适合我 不过也没关系

translation.en: Anyway, look, I don't know if anyone is truly 100% comfortable in their own skin,
translation.zh:
‎随便吧 我不知道
‎有没有人百分之百喜欢自己的身体

translation.en: but, one day, I hope to be.
Told you it was cheesy.
It was actually really cool.
Thank you.
Yeah.
[chuckling] Okay, I'll go. Um…
My boyfriend and I just broke up.
And, uh, he was my first boyfriend,
which I've heard is the hardest one to get over.
Anyways, uh, he…
He gave me these.
It's probably one of the sweetest things anyone has ever done for me.
translation.zh:
‎也许这是别人为我做过
‎最美好的事情

translation.en: But as long as these exist,
I don't think I'll be able to move on.
And I want to move on.
I need to move on.
So, um, this is the first step.
Okay.
-Wait, no, no, no, no. -Hey! -No! I don't want to move on. -That's not safe.

‎-等等 不 我不想向前
‎-这样不安全

translation.en: -I think it's too late. -I got it!
Jodi says she'll be here soon. She's finishing up a cast thing.

‎她说很快就过来
‎她在忙剧团的事情

translation.en: Of course she is.
So did you tell your parents the good news yet?
translation.zh:
‎所以… ‎-你把好消息告诉父母了吗？
‎-还没有

translation.en: [Fareeda] Not yet.
translation.zh:
‎-你把好消息告诉父母了吗？
‎-还没有

translation.en: Fareeda's shirts sold out!
No way!
-[laughs] -Well, that's wonderful, dear!
translation.zh: ‎好吧 太好了 亲爱的！

translation.en: -You should be proud of yourself. -Yeah.
I am. Are you?
-Of course we are. -Yes.
But you turned 17 today, and it's time to get serious about your future.
translation.zh:
‎但是你今天17岁了
‎是时候认真考虑未来了

translation.en: And it's not that we don't think that you're talented, because we do.
translation.zh:
‎这并不是因为我们认为你没有天赋
‎我们相信你

translation.en: But the odds of succeeding in the fashion industry are next to impossible, sweetheart.
translation.zh:
‎但是想在时尚领域成功
‎几乎不可能

translation.en: -Medical school is a safer career path. -Exactly. Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-医学院是一条更稳妥的职业道路
‎-对啊 没错

translation.en: With all due respect, one of the many things I've admired about your daughter
translation.zh:
‎恕我直言
‎我最佩服你们女儿的一点是

translation.en: is that she forges her own path.
I can't wait to see what's waiting for her at the end of it.
translation.zh: ‎我等不及看她能变成什么样

translation.en: -Can I get you anything else? -No.
-But you can put him on a separate check. -Honey.
translation.zh:
‎-但是你给他单独开个单子
‎-亲爱的

translation.en: -I'm kidding. -[all laugh] I'm kidding.
-[murmurs] I am not kidding. -Hm? -I am watching that boy. -Oh my…
translation.zh: ‎我没有开玩笑 我要看着这个男孩

translation.en: So, uh, it turns out I am not ready to move on.
translation.zh: ‎事实证明 我并没有准备好向前

translation.en: Yeah.
Appears that way.
I'm so sorry.
For what?
I feel like I led you on with that kiss.
You didn't lead me on.
As much as it pains me to say this,
I don't think you should give up on your ex.
translation.zh: ‎但我觉得你不该放弃你的前男友

translation.en: Because if you do,
this pair of crispy, ankle-strap platforms will be the only memory of your time together.
translation.zh:
‎那这双脆弱的系带高跟鞋
‎将会成为你们共同时光的唯一回忆

translation.en: You really know your shoes.
I grew up with three sisters.
Friends?
Friends.
[Schnipper] Kimmy!
Hey, hey, hey. Hey! Hey!
-Dude, that was so cool! -What?
You saved Jodi's shoes.
They were designer. It'd be a sin to let 'em burn.
translation.zh: ‎那是设计师款 让它们烧掉是种罪过

translation.en: -You are evolving. -You take that back.
Like a tiny caterpillar into a beautiful chrysalis.
translation.zh: ‎好比一只小毛毛虫变成了美丽的蝶蛹

translation.en: A chrysalis is the transition state between caterpillar and butterfly.
translation.zh: ‎蝶蛹是毛毛虫和蝴蝶之间的阶段

translation.en: -I know what it is. -I knew you had a good heart.
translation.zh:
‎-我知道是什么
‎-我知道你有副好心肠

translation.en: -You know nothing. -Sure, Kimmy.
translation.zh:
‎-你什么都不知道
‎-行吧 基米

translation.en: [chuckles] Whatever you say.
Nothing!
♪ Happy birthday to you! ♪
Yeah! Make a wish.
-[dad] Yeah! -Whoo! [Dunk] There we go!
[emcee] Next up on stage, please welcome Fareeda and Stig.
translation.zh:
‎接下来要上台的是
‎法丽达和斯蒂格！

translation.en: -What did you do? -I signed us up for a song.
translation.zh:
‎-你做什么了？
‎-我给我们点了一首歌

translation.en: -No. No. Come on, no. -Yeah. -No, no, no, no. -Yeah.
-Come on! Come on. -No. -Come on! -[Stella] Just go!
Fareeda, why would you think this is a good idea?
translation.zh: ‎为什么你觉得这是个好主意？

translation.en: The only way to conquer your fear of singing in front of people is to just do it.
translation.zh:
‎唯一让你战胜在人前唱歌恐惧的方法
‎就是直接去做

translation.en: He's a little shy. Give him a hand, people.
translation.zh: ‎他有点害羞 大家给他一点掌声

translation.en: -No. No. -[cheering]
Just a little something to remind you of home.
translation.zh: ‎只是一曲让你想起家乡的歌

translation.en: -♪ Take a chance, take a chance ♪ -♪ If you change your mind ♪
-♪ I'm the first in line ♪ -♪ Take a chance, chance ♪
-♪ Honey, I'm still free ♪ -♪ Take a chance ♪
-♪ Take a chance on me ♪ -♪ Take a chance, take a chance ♪
-♪ If you need me, let me know ♪ -♪ Let me know ♪
translation.zh:
‎-如果你需要我 就告诉我
‎-告诉我

translation.en: -♪ Gonna be around ♪ -♪ Take a chance, chance ♪
♪ If you've got no place to go If you're feeling down ♪ ♪ Take a chance, chance Take a chance ♪

translation.en: ♪ If you're all alone When the pretty birds have flown ♪
translation.zh:
‎如果你感到孤寂
‎当美丽的鸟儿已经飞走了

translation.en: ♪ Honey, I'm still free Take a chance on me ♪

‎亲爱的 我还单身
‎给我一次机会

translation.en: ♪ Gonna do my very best ♪
♪ And it ain't no lie ♪
♪ If you put me to the test ♪
♪ If you let me try ♪
♪ Take a chance on me, yeah ♪
♪ That's all I ask of you, honey ♪
