translation.en: -♪ We could go dancin' ♪ -♪ Uh-huh ♪
♪ We can go walkin' ♪
translation.zh:
‎-哇
‎-对吗？ ‎我们可以散步 只要我们在一起

translation.en: -♪ As long as we're together ♪ -♪ Together ♪
translation.zh: ‎我们可以散步 只要我们在一起

translation.en: -♪ Listen to some music ♪ -♪ Uh-huh ♪
-♪ Maybe just talkin' ♪ -♪ Uh-huh ♪
-♪ Get to know you better ♪ -♪ Better ♪
-♪ Take a chance on me, yeah ♪ -[laughs]
♪ Take a chance on me, yeah ♪
♪ Take a chance on me ♪
Go, Stig! Go, Stig! Whoo!
Sweden!
-[laughs] That was so much fun. Aah! -So much fun.
-Can I put these in your trunk? -Sure.
translation.zh:
‎-我可以把这些放进你的后备箱吗？
‎-可以

translation.en: No, wait!
Those are my shirts.
Yeah.
You bought them all?
You were losing confidence in yourself. I--
I thought this might help give some of it back.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得这样会让你有些信心

translation.en: That is so…
unbelievably stupid.
Why was it stupid?
Because nothing's changed. I still failed.
translation.zh:
‎因为什么都没改变
‎我还是失败了

translation.en: But if you want something bad enough, you go for it until you get it.
translation.zh:
‎但是如果你很想要一样东西
‎那就该去追求 一直到你拿下它

translation.en: You don't take no for an answer. Just like I did with you and Dunkers.
translation.zh:
‎你不能拒绝寻找答案
‎就像我和你还有邓柯儿一样

translation.en: You wanted nothing to do with me, and now look. We're all friends again.
translation.zh:
‎你们不想和我有什么关系
‎但是现在看呀 我们又成了朋友

translation.en: If I had given up, I… Well, I wouldn't even be here right now.
translation.zh:
‎如果我放弃了
‎现在就不会出现在这里

translation.en: Well, I'm really glad you are here.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我很高兴你出现在这里

translation.en: Yeah, me too.
-Happy birthday. -[chuckles]
That was very bad.
Oh no. Oh, I ate a lot of garlic, Fareeda, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: ‎不 我吃了很多蒜 法丽达 对不起

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry. Let me get a mint, and then we'll try it again?
translation.zh:
‎不好意思 我吃颗薄荷糖
‎然后我们再试一次？

translation.en: Well, no, not the kiss. I just broke girl code.
translation.zh:
‎不 不是那个吻
‎我刚破坏了姐们儿义气

translation.en: You did?
I can't kiss a guy my best friend used to like.
translation.zh: ‎我不能亲吻一个好朋友喜欢过的人

translation.en: Sorry, I'm not up to date on the codes.
translation.zh: ‎对不起 我不知道有那什么义气

translation.en: Now she shows up?
-Act cool. Act cool. -Yeah, yeah, yeah.
Sorry. Oh my God, I am so, so sorry that I'm late. I--
translation.zh: ‎对不起 天啊 很抱歉我迟到了

translation.en: -Happy birthday. -[chuckles]
-Don't sweat it. -Seriously?
I just missed your birthday dinner. You're not mad?
translation.zh:
‎我刚刚错过了你的生日派对
‎你不生气吗？

translation.en: No. I mean, it's not cool to miss your best friend's birthday,
translation.zh:
‎不 我是说
‎错过好朋友的生日不太好

translation.en: but things happen. And I'm a very forgiving person.
translation.zh:
‎但是有时候就会这样
‎我是个很宽容的人

translation.en: We should all be more forgiving.
Because like I said, things happen. [giggles]
translation.zh: ‎正如我所说嘛 有时候就会这样

translation.en: Yeah.
They do.
Yeah.
Where's Dunk?
-I wanna talk to him. -Inside.
-Okay. Happy birthday. -[chuckling] Thanks.
Have fun. [chuckles]
[Dunk and Stella] ♪ Risking it all in a glance ♪
♪ I don't care who you are ♪
translation.zh: ‎我不在乎 ‎你是怎样的人 你从哪里来

translation.en: ♪ Where you're from ♪
translation.zh: ‎你是怎样的人 你从哪里来

translation.en: ♪ What you do ♪
♪ As long as you love me… ♪
[voice] Looks like Dunk's still living his best life, and you're still living your worst.
translation.zh:
‎看起来邓柯儿正在享受人生
‎而你还在苦苦煎熬

translation.en: ♪ Don't care what you did ♪
♪ As long as you love me ♪
[dad] Wait, so Juilliard has a summer theater program?
translation.zh: ‎朱莉娅学院有暑期戏剧项目？

translation.en: [mom] Yes. If she wants to apply there for college, getting in the summer program will give her a leg up on the competition.
translation.zh:
‎对 如果她想申请那里
‎暑期项目会对她有帮助

translation.en: [voice] They won't be talking about Juilliard after they see you in the show.
translation.zh:
‎他们看完你的表演后
‎就不会再说朱莉娅了

translation.en: I think we should hire a professional videographer for the show.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得我们应该为那场演出
‎找个摄像师

translation.en: -Yes! I'm seeing three-camera set up. -Yep.
[dad] Oh, at least.
-Right? -Have you two lost your minds? -Hey! -What?
It's never too early to start thinking--
No, this is the last thing I need to think about right now.
translation.zh: ‎不 这是我现在最不想去想的事情

translation.en: Is something wrong?
I've been spending all my time on the show, so I'm failing calculus.
translation.zh:
‎我把时间都花在表演上
‎然后我的微积分考砸了

translation.en: I just lost Dunkleman.
Then I burned the shoes that he gave me, and I'm going to be horrible in the show,
translation.zh:
‎然后我把他送我的鞋子烧了
‎我的表演会非常糟糕

translation.en: and you guys just keep inviting people that are just gonna sit and watch me fail.
translation.zh:
‎你们还在不停邀请别人
‎去看我的失败

translation.en: And Harper, she's moving 2,000 miles away,
translation.zh:
‎还有哈珀
‎她要搬到3200公里以外

translation.en: and there is no way in hell that Juilliard, or anyone, for that matter,
translation.zh:
‎朱莉亚或者什么
‎都根本没有任何可能

translation.en: is gonna want anything to do with me, so I just…
translation.zh: ‎这些跟我都没关系了 所以我只是…

translation.en: Are you okay?
Mom, I can't breathe. I can't breathe.
translation.zh: ‎妈妈 我不能呼吸了 我无法呼吸

translation.en: [mom] Pull over. Richie, pull over.
-You're okay. -I can't breathe.
-You're okay. Just relax. -I'm not. Slow deep breaths. In.
translation.zh: ‎放松下来 慢慢深呼吸 吸

translation.en: -Out. -I can't.
You're not in any danger.
-Just tell yourself, "This is temporary." -This is temporary.
translation.zh:
‎-告诉自己 “这是暂时的”
‎-这是暂时的

translation.en: -"It's not forever." -It's not forever. -"This will end." -This will end. [gasps]
translation.zh:
‎-“不会永远如此 会结束的”
‎-不会永远如此 会结束的

translation.en: Here.
[Richie] There you go.
How did you know what to say?
[Richie] Your mom has been backstage
at, like, a thousand beauty pageants.
So I tried to learn some tips in case it ever happened to Harper.
translation.zh:
‎所以我学了一些招式
‎以防哈珀会这样

translation.en: I'm so sorry that I'm the screwed-up daughter.
translation.zh: ‎很抱歉我是个糟糕的女儿 我不回…

translation.en: -I don't… -Oh, stop that! You're perfect as you are.
Aah, anxiety attacks are really common.
-Especially with parents like us. -Dad.
translation.zh:
‎-特别是有我们这样的父母
‎-爸爸

translation.en: We have put way too much pressure on you with the invites and the Juilliard.
translation.zh: ‎我们给了你太大的压力 ‎邀请了那么多人还有朱莉亚…

translation.en: We should have seen it coming.
So, could you, um… Could you guys give me some tips,
you know, just in case it ever happens again? [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎以防万一又发生这种事了呢？

translation.en: Yeah. We can do that.
I mean, you two did screw me up. The least you could do is try to fix me.
translation.zh:
‎你们俩把我搞砸了
‎至少得做点什么补救一下

translation.en: -Oh, too soon. -[laughs] Yeah, not funny yet.
translation.zh: ‎太快了 好吧 还不好玩

translation.en: Okay, now it's funny. -Okay. -[all laugh]
[Jodi] Wow, uh…
Packing already?
I just thought I'd get a head start on it.
So…
I've been sitting here all night
staring at these boxes.
And I can't bring myself to tape them up.
Because ever since I was eight years old, no matter what I did,
translation.zh: ‎因为自从八岁开始 不管我做什么

translation.en: you were there.
You guys are my support system.
-And now I won't have that anymore. -No.
Just because we're not in the audience doesn't mean that we're not there for you.
translation.zh: ‎我们不在观众席里 ‎不代表我们不支持你

translation.en: But what if I tank this job?
translation.zh: ‎但是如果我把工作搞砸了呢？

translation.en: Or what if I get fired?
What if beauty pageants are the only thing I'm actually good at?
translation.zh: ‎要是我只是擅长做选美皇后呢？

translation.en: Harper, since when do you…
get that voice?
Since always.
-Surprise! [laughs] -What?
[laughs] What about the,
"If you don't learn to control it, it's gonna control you"?
translation.zh:
‎“你如果不学着控制
‎它就会控制你呢？”

translation.en: Yeah, I don't know how to control it. I just wanted to sound like I did.
translation.zh:
‎对 我不知道如何控制
‎我只是想要听起来像是能做到

translation.en: You don't always have to have the right answer for everything.
translation.zh: ‎并不总是能有一切问题的正确答案

translation.en: Well, I do if I want people to take me seriously.
translation.zh:
‎如果我希望别人认真待我的时候
‎就会这么做

translation.en: And not just see me as some ex-beauty queen.
translation.zh: ‎而不是把我当成前任选美皇后

translation.en: You want people to take you seriously?
Then know that you don't have to be afraid to say, "I don't know,"
translation.zh: ‎那就别害怕在不知道的时候说出

translation.en: if you don't know.
I'll tell you one thing I definitely don't know.
translation.zh: ‎我要告诉你一件我真不知道的事情

translation.en: How I'm gonna survive without you.
Me neither.
-So how am I gonna do this? -[both laugh and sniffle]
Pack, or… or leave us?
Both. Both.
One box at a time.
-Whoa. -Ready? That was a good one.
-Hefty! -You ready for these arms?
Hey, man, you can't sleep either?
Not a wink.
What's your excuse?
Well, I kissed someone.
-Was it Jodi? Tell me it wasn't. -No, it wasn't. I swear.
translation.zh:
‎-是乔蒂吗？告诉我不是
‎-不 不是她 我发誓

translation.en: Who was it?
It was Fareeda.
-What? Fareeda? -Yeah.
That's awesome, right?
Except she says it can't go anywhere because of girl code.
translation.zh:
‎但是她说不能继续
‎因为什么姐们儿义气

translation.en: If-- If that's what she wants, then you have to respect that.
translation.zh: ‎如果她这么想 那你得尊重她

translation.en: [groans] I should've joined your stupid alliance when I had the chance.
translation.zh: ‎我之前应该加入你们的愚蠢联盟

translation.en: Don't say that. Isn't it better to have loved and lost
translation.zh: ‎别这么说 爱过然后失去

translation.en: than to have never loved at all?
I wouldn't take back the three months I spent with Jodi for anything.
translation.zh: ‎我不会后悔跟乔蒂在一起的那几个月

translation.en: The dinner party? The turducken? You ruined three birds, Dunkers.
translation.zh:
‎那次晚宴？火鸭鸡？
‎你毁了三只鸟 邓柯儿

translation.en: Damn, man. I wouldn't take it back.
You know, in a weird way,
it never would have happened if you didn't show up,
translation.zh: ‎如果你不出现 这些都不会发生

translation.en: so I kind of owe it to you.
Glad to be of service, Dunk. That's what friends do.
translation.zh: ‎很高兴为你服务 邓柯儿 ‎朋友就应如此

translation.en: I know you're supposed to leave when the semester ends.
translation.zh:
‎我知道这学期结束后
‎你应该要离开了

translation.en: Yeah.
But if… Ugh. I mean, if you wanted to,
translation.zh: ‎但是…我是说 如果你愿意

translation.en: you should stay here for the summer.
-Here? Me? -Yes. -Yes. -Dunk?
-Yes. -Me and Dunk? Stig and Dunk?
-Yes! Whoo-hoo-hoo! -Oh God, all right.
Dude! It's going to be the best summer ever!
♪ Supersonic, tonight I want it ♪ ♪ So keep it comin' ♪ ♪ Whoo-hoo-ooh-ooh ♪ ♪ Supersonic ♪
[Jodi] Wait, you bought all of them?
translation.zh: ‎等等 你把衣服都买下了？

translation.en: [Stig laughs] Yeah, she's cool with it now, but when she saw it, she flipped out.
translation.zh:
‎对 她现在能接受了
‎但是她当时看到的时候都懵了

translation.en: -I didn't flip out. -Oh, you did too.
Shut up. [laughing]
Hey, Fareeda.
I know.
Know what?
I know.
I actually knew the other night in the parking lot.
And it's okay.
Are you sure?
Trust me, it is the only thing in my life that I am sure of right now.
translation.zh:
‎相信我 这是我此时人生中
‎唯一能确定的事情

translation.en: -Thank you. -Of course.
Did we just reverse the girl codes?
translation.zh: ‎我们是扭转了姐们儿义气吗？

translation.en: -[both laugh] -Mmkay. Okay, you two have fun.
translation.zh: ‎行吧 好了 你俩好好玩

translation.en: -[Fareeda] Got that mint? -[Stig] Oh, I have that mint.
translation.zh:
‎-吃了薄荷糖吗？
‎-我吃了薄荷糖

translation.en: Surprised to see you here.
Just doing my part to support the arts.
Yeah.
Okay, look, I know that you don't wanna talk to me and I get it.
translation.zh: ‎听着 我知道你不想和我说话 我能懂

translation.en: I do. [sighs]
But I wanna let you know
I'm gonna leave you a ticket at the box office tomorrow.
translation.zh: ‎我明天会在售票口给你留张票

translation.en: Although, who knows? Maybe I just won't show up myself.
translation.zh:
‎不过也说不准
‎也许我自己都不会出现

translation.en: -Wait, what? -I don't know. I just…
translation.zh:
‎-等等 什么？
‎-我不知道 ‎我只是…

translation.en: I've just been hearing that
maybe I'm not good enough,
or maybe I'm just not ready to do this sort of thing yet.
translation.zh: ‎也许我还没准备好迎接这些

translation.en: Well, whoever's saying that is wrong.
They don't know you like I know you.
Trust me. That's all just noise. You're gonna crush it.
translation.zh: ‎相信我 那只是噪音 你会表现很好的

translation.en: Dunkers.
I need a spot.
Glad we had this talk.
[Dunk] What? What's wrong?
It's Ingvar. He face called me. He wants to get back together.
translation.zh:
‎是英瓦 他打了视频电话给我
‎他想要复合

translation.en: Let me talk to this guy. Let me talk to him!
translation.zh:
‎让我和这个家伙说话
‎让我和他说话！

translation.en: Listen here, Ingvar!
Holy crap. He's gorgeous.
His face is so symmetrical.
-Keep going. -Okay.
Listen, Ingvar.
You broke Stella's heart.
Shame on you for trying to trick her into thinking you can piece it back together.
translation.zh:
‎你竟然还想要跟她复合
‎真为你羞耻

translation.en: So text me the name of whatever hair product it is you're using,
translation.zh:
‎把你现在用来做头发的产品名称
‎都发给我

translation.en: and then lose her number. Yep. Bye.
translation.zh: ‎然后删掉她的号码 好了 再见

translation.en: Boom! That's how you spot. Come on.
What's wrong?
I still want that.
Ew. Your brother?
No, not my brother. And not Ingvar.
translation.zh: ‎不 不是和我弟弟 也不是英瓦

translation.en: Isn't there a little part of you that still wants that with Jodi?
translation.zh: ‎你是不是还有点想和乔蒂那样？

translation.en: No.
Yeah, of course, obviously. Like every part of me.
translation.zh: ‎有 当然 很明显 我特别想

translation.en: But… I just-- I don't know if I can trust her again.
translation.zh: ‎但是我不知道自己还能不能相信她

translation.en: Your whole life, you put her on a pedestal.
translation.zh: ‎你从来都没有发现过她的缺点

translation.en: The second she does something that ruins your perfect image of her,
translation.zh:
‎但是一旦她做出
‎破坏了你心中完美形象的事情

translation.en: you push her off of it.
-[murmur of conversation] -[Stig] Hey!
-That's my daughter. -[Richie laughs] -That's my kiddo. -[Harper] Mom.
translation.zh: ‎那是我女儿 那是我孩子

translation.en: -Mom, we gotta… -Okay. Sit down.
-Settle down. Okay. -Okay.
I'm good. I'm settled. I'm fine.
translation.zh: ‎我挺好 我做好了 我没事

translation.en: -Look at that. -So excited.
[voice] Wow, a packed house… packed house…
Twenty bucks says you fall flat on your face… face…
translation.zh: ‎我赌上二十块钱 你会搞砸的

translation.en: You're about to humiliate yourself in front of all the people you care about.
translation.zh:
‎你将会在一群在乎的人面前
‎好好羞辱你自己

translation.en: Sorry.
[voice] Except Dunkleman, who didn't show.
translation.zh: ‎除了邓柯曼 他没有出现

translation.en: Guess he couldn't bear to watch you crash and burn.
translation.zh:
‎我猜他是受不了
‎看着你惨败得一塌糊涂

translation.en: Excuse me.
In a few short hours, you'll go back to being just the tall girl.
translation.zh:
‎再过几个小时
‎你又会变成那个高个女孩

translation.en: Okay. This is not forever. It's temporary.
translation.zh: ‎不会永远这样 这是暂时的

translation.en: Aww, look who's trying to ground herself by tidying up… tidying up…
translation.zh:
‎看看这是谁在靠着收拾东西
‎来让自己冷静

translation.en: How's that workin' out… workin' out…
Don't you get it? You will never control me.
translation.zh: ‎你还不懂吗？你永远控制不了我

translation.en: I control you.
[Kimmy] Jodi?
-[sighs] -You okay? You're on soon.
Look, I can't… I can't go out there.
-Why not? Jodi, why not? -[sighs]
translation.zh: ‎为什么不？乔蒂 为什么不？

translation.en: I am afraid I'm going to have an anxiety attack on stage, okay?
translation.zh: ‎我害怕在舞台上焦虑发作 好吗？

translation.en: -You get those too? -What do you mean, "too"?
translation.zh:
‎-你也会这样吗？
‎-你说“也”是什么意思？

translation.en: I'm a 17-year-old on planet Earth. It'd be weird if I didn't get anxiety attacks.
translation.zh:
‎地球上的我也才17岁
‎我要没有才奇怪吧

translation.en: Okay, but you can still go on for me, right? 'Cause I can't.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 但你还是可以代我上台 对吗？
‎因为我做不到

translation.en: No. No.
But this is what you wanted, isn't it?
-Yeah, but not like this. -Wh--
But I will stand in the wings for the entire show.
And if you get tripped up, just look over and I'll cue you.
translation.zh:
‎如果你糊涂了
‎就看过来 我会给你提示

translation.en: Okay?
I've got your back. I won't let you fail.
translation.zh: ‎我会支持你 我不会让你搞砸

translation.en: Thank you.
Now, go get dressed.
-Go. -Yeah.
[Schnipper] That wasn't so hard, was it?
Putting someone else's needs before your own?
translation.zh: ‎把别人的需求放在自己的前面？

translation.en: I literally almost puked.
Does kindness always burn?
translation.zh: ‎友善是不是总这么火辣辣的？

translation.en: Only when you're doing it right.
translation.zh: ‎只要当你做对了一件事的时候

translation.en: Come here, girl.
Hey, does Jodi ever mention me at all?
-[laughs] -Let it go, dude.
Letting it go.
[voice] Break a leg, Jodi… leg, Jodi… You're gonna need all the luck you can get.
translation.zh: ‎祝你好运 乔蒂 只能看运气了

translation.en: -You're gonna choke. -[Jodi thinks] It's just noise.
Breathe.
[shakily] ♪ One boy ♪
♪ One special boy ♪
♪ One boy to go with ♪
♪ And talk with ♪
♪ And walk with ♪
♪ One boy ♪
-♪ That's the way it should be ♪ -[piano accompaniment starts]
[chorus join in] ♪ One boy ♪
♪ One steady boy ♪
[confidently] ♪ One boy to be with ♪
♪ Forever and ever ♪
♪ One boy ♪
♪ That's the way it should be ♪
-♪ One day you'll find out ♪ -♪ Ooh ♪
-♪ Ooh ♪ -♪ This is what life is all about ♪
-♪ You need someone who ♪ -♪ Ooh ♪
-♪ Ooh ♪ -♪ Is living just for you ♪
-♪ One boy ♪ -♪ One boy ♪
-♪ That's the way it should be ♪ -♪ Ooh ♪
I, Kim MacAfee…
[voice] Wait, so you actually did forget your lines? How embarrassing!
translation.zh: ‎等等 你真的忘词了 多么尴尬啊！

translation.en: [Jodi thinks] Get it together, Jodi.
[whispers] Being of sound mind and body…
translation.zh: ‎本人精神正常 身体健康…

translation.en: …being of sound mind and body… -[both sigh] -Okay. …promise to be loyal to Conrad Birdie…
translation.zh:
‎本人精神正常 身体健康
‎在此承诺将会忠于康拉德·伯蒂…

translation.en: -♪ There's music to play ♪ -♪ Aah ♪
♪ Places to go, people to see ♪
♪ Everything for you and me ♪
♪ Life's a ball, if only you know it ♪
translation.zh: ‎想要告诉你 生活如同舞会

translation.en: ♪ And it's all just waiting for you ♪
♪ You're alive, so come on and show it ♪
translation.zh: ‎你还活着 那就加油表现吧

translation.en: ♪ Oh, we've got a lot of livin' ♪
♪ Such a lot of livin' ♪
-[Tommy] ♪ There's music to play, hey ♪ -[Jodi] ♪ Places to go ♪
translation.zh:
‎-还有音乐要听 嘿
